loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is a businesswoman from Solinog, Calamba. She is 64 years old, married and has expertise in selling. She runs a little sari-sari store and earns a meager income that is adequate to support her family. 

Myrna is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without a record of default. Now, she has applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. 

Myrna continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to successfully face all challenges with courage for her family.

loans.use: to buy stocks of groceries, especially basic commodities

loans.name: Estanisalo

texts.es:
el Sr. Estanisalo tiene 54 años, es casado y tiene 5 hijos todos mayores de edad ya ninguno van a la escuela. los sueños y esperanzas del prestatario para el futuro son incrementar las áreas de producción del cultivo y arreglar su casa.
Don Estanislao utilizara el préstamo para la compra de abono orgánico para el cultivo de patata y maíz. El préstamo ayudara a tener una mejor economía familiar y en la ampliación de la siembra del cultivo.
Con 35 años en el negocio le gusta por ser rentable y por la gran demanda que existe en la zona.
texts.en:
Estanisalo is 54 years old, married, and has 5 adult children that are not in school.  His hopes and dreams are to expand the area he is able to cultivate and repair his house.  

Estanisalo will use this loan to buy organic fertilizer to cultivate potatoes and corn, which will help him increase his income and help expand his farmland.  

He has been farming for 35 years and enjoys good profit because of high demand in the area.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer for his potato and corn

loans.name: José Santos

texts.es:
El Sr. José Santos tiene 40 años de edad 3 hijos de los cuales todos van a la escuela, dentro de los sueños y esperanzas para el futuro son la auto generación de recursos para realización de inversiones en el futuro. 
El préstamo sera utilizado en la compra de abono orgánico de maíz.
El préstamo ayudara  a incrementar la producción de maíz generando mayores ingresos en la canasta familiar; Don José santos tiene 15 años en el cultivo de maíz y sigue sembrando porque es un cultivo rentable y genera ganancias.
texts.en:
Jose Santos is 40 years old and has 3 children all of whom are in school.  His hopes and dreams are to be able to easily support him and his family and invest in the future.  This loan will be used to buy organic fertilizer for his corn.  It will will help him increase his production and family income.  

Jose Santos has been farming for 15 years and enjoys it because it is profitable.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer for his corn

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Don Jorge Alberto tiene 46 años de edad, es profesor de primaria tiene 4 hijos(23-22-10-4) los dos últimos van a la escuela.
Los sueños y esperanzas de Don Jorge Alberto son educar hasta la Universidad a sus hijos así como ponerle agua a su parcela de tara. El préstamo sera utilizado para la compra de abono orgánico para realizar un manejo sostenible de su terreno debido a que el señor cuenta con certificado Orgánico.
Don Jorge Alberto tiene 10 años de experiencia es este negocio y le gusta por la rentabilidad, poca presencia de plagas y por mantener un precio estable.
texts.en:
Jorge Alberto is 46 years old, and a grade school teacher.  He has 4 children ages 23, 22, 10, and 4, the youngest two are in school.  His hopes and dreams are that his children can go to college one day, and to install an irrigation system on his farm.  This loan will be used to buy organic fertilizer to maintain the sustainable production of his land since he is a certified organic farmer.  

In addition to teaching Jorge Alberto has been farming tara for 10 years, which he enjoys because of the extra income, little chance of disease affecting his crop, and the price is very stable.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilzier for his tara crop

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es:
Don Juan José tiene 50 años de Edad, esta casado y tiene 4 hijos de (23-16-7-2 años) los cuales van a la escuela y a la universidad. Los sueños del productor son mejorar económicamente e invertir en la educación de sus demás hijos así como en la construcción y mejoramiento de su vivienda.
El préstamo sera usado en la compra de abono orgánico para el cultivo de patata, el prestatario tiene 38 años de experiencia cultivando la patata.
texts.en:
Juan Jose is 50 years old, married, and has 4 children ages 23, 16, 7, and 2, all of whom are in school or university.  His dreams are to increase his income so he can pay for his children's education and make improvements his house.  

This loan will be used to buy organic fertilizer to cultivate potatoes.  Juan Jose has 38 years of farming experience.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer for his potato crop

loans.name: Carlito

texts.en:
Carlito lives in Canubay, Oroquieta. He has a fish-vending business and owns a fish pond as well. Carlito has earned a promising income doing this type of activity for the past five years, enabling him to sufficiently provide for his family. 

Now, he wants a comfortable living space for his family. Out of the money he has saved from his earnings, Carlito has started to repair his house.  To finish his project, he has requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase additional materials for his house, fishing materials, and more fingerlings for his fish pond. 

Carlito has high hopes that this will grow and continue to benefit his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for his house, fishing materials, and more fingerlings for his fish pond

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia, 50, is married with 4 adult-aged children. Her major source of income is buying and selling grocery items. She has been in this business for 20 years already. 

The business has helped her meet her family's financial needs, especially the education of her children until they graduated and got jobs. She is still continuing her business because it provides good income due to her loyal customers. Someday, she will have a legacy to leave to her children. 

Her plan is to maintain her inventory so that her customers will be served well. She is still planning for a business expansion for the good of her children and even her grandchildren. 

She previously availed loans to purchase additional stock and now she is re-applying for a loan for her store.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery items for her store.

location.town: Pagadian - San Miguel. Zambo. del Sur

loans.name: Juvael

texts.es:
El Sr. Juvael  tiene 37 años de edad,soltero y tiene 18 años en el negocio de tara por lo que conoce muy bien el manejo forestal de la tara.
La tara tiene gran demanda en la zona y el precio el los últimos años se ha mantenido estable.Los sueños y esperanzas del Sr. Juvael  es incrementar la producción de su parcela así como tener una mayor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Juvael is 37 years old, single, and has been farming tara root for 18 years giving him an extensive knowledge of the practice.  His business has a strong demand and prices in his area have remained stable in recent years.  

Juvael's dream is to increase the production of his land in order to achieve a stable economic situation.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer for his tara crop

loans.name: Florida

texts.en:
"Hardworking mother" best describes Florida, 51 years old, residing in the Sinian municipality of Baliangao, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Florida has four children and is married to a farmer.  The wage that her husband earns is not enough to sustain the daily needs of their family. So, Florida started a business, a food stand or “carenderia.” Florida has been in this business for more than a year now. 

Florida wants to expand her food stand business.  She wants to gain more profit and to have enough to sustain her family, especially for her children, and she would like to send her son to college. In order for Florida to make her wish possible, she needs 25,000 PHP additional capital and will use the money to expand her business.  She intends to buy meat, rice toppings and all the ingredients, utensils and other things that are needed in the food stand. She hopes to live a comfortable life someday with her family.

loans.use: to buy meat, rice toppings and other ingredients

loans.name: Jurinda

texts.en:
Jurinda earns a living through her beauty shop, offering manicure/pedicure, hair cut, hair color, hair re-bond and other services.  She is 43 years old, married, and lives in Pagadian, Zamboanga del Sur. 

She is well-known for the quality of services she offers.  She has already purchased some new hair treatment sets and was able to save money from them.  Her services are self-sustainable and they have become profitable, with a net profit of about Php 4,000 per month. 

Jurinda is seeking a Php 9,000 loan.  She would like to use the loan to purchase special items for foot spa services. 

Jurinda is very diligent and loves accuracy, which adds to the effective management of her venture.

loans.use: to purchase special items for foot spa services.

loans.name: Consolacion

texts.en:
Consolacion has a collection of ornamental garden plants. She finds pleasure in doing her gardening activities and also earns income for her family through her work. 

As a Microfinance member of PMPC, she has sought financial help to purchase a variety of ornamental plants that she can grow and sell, and to also pay for flower herbicides. 

In the future, Consolacion wishes to become a supplier of flowers in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of ornamental plants and to pay for herbicides.

loans.name: Nelie

texts.en:
In February of 2011, Nelie applied for membership in PMPC and had her first loan. She is from Talic, Oroquieta. Nelie came up with the idea of starting a business. She had the skills to make "suman" (rice cake) but she had no starting capital. She joined PMPC after hearing that she could request financial assistance. Nelie applied for a loan to start her suman-making business and it has been doing well for years. 

Recently, she requested a loan to purchase additional cooking equipment like a steamer and other raw ingredients to increase her production to provide for more customers and to be able to display her suman in shops and cafes on consignment. She also plans to use her additional revenue for her increasing orders. Nelie is thankful for the financing she gets for her capital needs. In addition, she wants to expand and improve her business and hopes to open a house of suman near the town.

loans.use: to purchase additional cooking equipment like a steamer and other raw ingredients to increase her production

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Afi vit à Apédokoè et est âgée de 35 ans. Mariée, Afi est mère de cinq enfants et œuvre dynamiquement pour favoriser leur éducation. Afi vend des produits d’alimentations générales à la devanture de sa maison pour avoir son revenu pour leur subsistance. Afi s’approvisionne six fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des spaghettis et des bidons d’huile, Afi demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et tirer sa rentabilité nécessaire.
texts.en:
Afi, age 35, lives in Apédokoè. She's married and the mother of five children, and she strives to foster their education.

To earn an income and feed her children, she sells food staples in front of her house. She gets her supplies at the market six times a month.

She's seeking this loan to order spaghettis and cans of oil, buy those products, and make a necessary profit.

loans.use: to buy 40 boxes of spaghettis and 2 cans of oil

loans.name: Maria Nancy

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 33 años de edad, dedicada cuerpo y alma a las actividades agropecuarias y a su familia es madre de tres hijos, y con empuje, verraquera tiene su negocio de cría de cerdos, ganado, actividad que aprendió de su padre y que ha llevado a un nivel de lograr ser proveedora de una buena empresa.
Al tener buen movimiento de ventas necesita tener animales para no perder el contrato que es aquel que le está permitiendo progresar por eso pide una ayuda para que la apoyen en este préstamo que aunque sabe que es un monto considerable, será por una gran causa.

Con el préstamo quiere comprar ganado y cerdos, todo sus esfuerzos espera verlos reflejados en oportunidades de empleo en su empresa.
texts.en:
María is a 33-year-old woman who puts her heart and soul into her livestock business and her family. She is the mother of three children. She runs her pig and cattle-breeding business with courage, pluck and determination. It is a business that she learnt from her father and she has brought it to a level where she is a supplier to a good company.

As her sales flow is good, she needs animals to ensure that she does not lose the contract that is enabling her to move her business forward. This is why she is requesting help through a loan, which, although she realises is a considerable amount, will be put to good use. With the loan, she wants to buy cattle and pigs and she hopes that all her efforts will lead to employment opportunities in her company.

loans.use: to buy cattle and pigs, which she urgently needs to retain a supply contract with a company

loans.name: Marilu

texts.es:
Marilú tiene 25 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus menores hijos en El Sector El Palmo II, una zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores desde hace tres años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de sus animales y de esta manera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes, lo que le generará mayores ingresos para su familia y mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marilú is 25 years old. She lives with her spouse and their minor children in El Sector El Palmo II, a rural area in the district of Cayaltí, a community dedicated to agriculture, trade and livestock. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. 

She has raised and sold small animals for three years. Her business is located in back of her house. She has experience in this business and has good personal and work references in the area. She has asked for a loan to buy balanced feed to fatten her animals and in this way offer a better product to her customers. This will generate more income for her family and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to fatten her animals and in this way offer a better product to her customers.

loans.name: Enma De Jesus

texts.es:
Enma, de 58 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, está acompañada y su pareja es agricultor, tienen 2 hijos pero ya no viven con ellos, en su casa vive solo su nieto y su compañera de vida. 

Enma, se ha dedicado la mayor parte de su vida a los oficios domésticos, además le ayuda a su pareja a las labores agrícolas, pues siembran 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz cerca de su casa. 

El préstamo lo necesita para cambiar el techo de su casa, quiere colocarle duralita para sentirse más segura, porque ya se acerca la época lluviosa y no quiere que su casa se moje.- Anteriormente, se le otorgó un crédito para la agricultura y le fue bien. 

El sueño de Emma, es reparar su casa poco a poco, para dejársela a su nieto y espera que en las cosechas tenga buenas producciones para tener buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Enma, age 58, did not have the chance to go to school.  She is in a relationship, and her life partner is a farmer.  They have two children, but they no longer live with them.  Her life partner and her grandson are the only ones that live in her house.

Enma has devoted the greater part of her life to the domestic chores.  She also helps her life partner with the farm work.  They grow 7,000 square meters of corn close to her house.

She needs the loan to change the roof of her house.  She wants to replace the roof with Duralita [sheets of reinforced concrete that are intended to resemble roof tiles] in order to feel more secure.  This is because the rainy season is approaching, and she does not want her house to get wet.  

Previously, she was granted a loan for agriculture, and it went well for her.

Enma’s dream is to, little by little, repair her house in order to leave it to her grandson.  She hopes to get good production from the harvests in order to have good earnings.

loans.use: to change the roof of her house.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es: Sandra, tiene una edad de 29 años, madre de dos hijos y un grado de secundaria incompleta. Ella y su esposo se dedican al cultivo de café desde hace aproximadamente 10 años como fuente de ingresos para subsistir debido a que la zona donde habitan no hay más fuentes de trabajo que no se por agricultura. En esta zona el clima es muy cálido ideal para que la planta de café pueda crecer en las condiciones adecuadas. Como necesidad para esta temporada ella quiere se le apoye con un crédito con el cual comprar los diferentes insumos como abonos, foliares y pagar mano de obra para dar una asistencia adecuada y eficiente a su plantación. Ella tiene como meta la protección de su plantación, el cuidado y evitar el deterioro del mismo, salir adelante con cada cosecha y hacer de su negocio muy exitoso. Para con sus hijos apoyarlos en sus estudios e incentivarlos a que sean mejores personas en la vida, con mayores oportunidades de empleo y de superación.
texts.en: Sandra is 29 years old. She is the mother of two children and has an incomplete high school education. She and her husband have been growing coffee for approximately 10 years for a source of income to subsist due to the fact that in the area where they live there are no other sources of income aside from agriculture. In this area the climate is very warm, ideal for the coffee plant to grow in adequate conditions. As a necessity for this season, she wants to be supported with a loan with which she will buy different materials such as compost, foliar sprays, as well as to pay for labor costs to give sufficient and efficient help to her plants. She has as a goal the protection of her plants, the care and avoidance of their deterioration, and to get ahead with each harvest and to make her business very successful. For her children, she wants to help them in their education and motivate them to be better persons in life, with more opportunities and jobs to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy compost, foliar sprays, and fertilizer to help her coffee crops.

loans.name: Maricela Del Carmen

texts.es:
Maricela,  de 28 años de edad, está casada, su esposo tuvo que emigrar en busca de mejores oportunidades de empleo, actualmente vive con sus dos hijos de 5 y 7 años de edad.

Maricela, se dedica a vender licuados en su casa, de lunes a viernes, el sábado descansa y los domingos vende frutas y verduras en la iglesia del cantón.

El dinero lo necesita para construir un cuarto en a su casa, porque necesita más espacio y además sus hijos en un futuro, necesitaran cada uno su propio cuarto.

Su sueño es tener una casa mucho más grande y bien amueblada, para que sus hijos no tengan que irse de la casa cuando se casen, sino que continúen siendo una familia unida.
texts.en:
Maricela is 28 years old. She is married and her husband had to immigrate to seek better employment opportunities. Right now, she lives with her two children, aged 5 and 7.  

Maricela sells smoothies from her house Monday through Friday. On Saturday, she rests and on Sundays she sells fruits and vegetables in the canton church.

She needs the money to build a room in her house, because she needs more space and in addition, her children will each need their own room in the future. 

Her dream is to have a much bigger house that is well furnished so that her children don't have to leave home when they get married, and they can continue to be a close family.

loans.use: to build a room in her house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 26 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, posee una librería ubicada cerca de su casa en una zona muy transitada, tiene 2 años de poseer el negocio y tiene muchos clientes por la variedad de productos y los buenos precios, la joven vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de cuadernos, libros y papelería todo por mayor para tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: The young woman whose face has been pixelated, because she is 26 years old and lives in a high-risk zone, has a bookstore located near her house in a very high traffic area.  She has had this business for 2 years and has many customers for the variety of products and the good prices. The young woman lives in her own house with her husband. She is asking for a loan to purchase notebooks, books, and paper supplies, all in bulk, to have better earnings.

loans.use: to purchase notebooks, books, and paper supplies, all in bulk.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Maria de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos, ella se dedica a la siembra de de maíz y frijol desde hace varios años inicio con capital propio, cuando su cosecha ya esa lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego comercializarlos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, Maria esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. para seguir con sus cultivos y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Maria, 37 years old, lives in her own house with her husband and their four children. She has worked growing corn and beans for some years. She began with her own capital. When her harvest is ready, she stores it in the granary shown in the photograph, to later sell it in the different markets that are near her house. Maria is asking for a loan to purchase fertilizer, manure, pesticides, etc. to continue with her crops and in this way have more income.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, manure, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Reina De La Paz

texts.es:
Reina, es fotógrafo de profesión, desde que aprendió el negocio al cual se dedican sus padres, el cual es una foto-estudio, ella toma la decisión de montar su propia foto-estudio, la cual hoy es su principal fuente de ingresos, su esposo la apoya pero tiene su propio trabajo como abogado y se dedica a su profesión.

El cliente utilizará el préstamo para comprar equipo y material para la foto-estudio, ella ya ha tramitado financiamientos anteriormente y los ha invertido en su negocio y a mejorado su negocio.  

Reina, los principales sueños son ver crecer a sus hijos y mejorar más su negocio.
texts.en:
Reina, is a photographer by profession. Since she learned the business, which her parents do, which is a photography studio, she decided to open her own photography studio, which today is her primary source of income. Her husband supports her but has his own work as a lawyer and works in his profession. 

The client will use the loan to purchase equipment and material for the photography studio. She has taken out previous loans and has invested them in her business and improved her business.

Reina's primary dreams are to see her children grow and improve her business more.

loans.use: to purchase equipment and material for the photography studio.

loans.name: Claudia Roxana

texts.es: Claudia de 36 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hija y su padre, ella se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y maicillo su padre le ayuda en el trabajo agrícola, tiene 7 años de experiencia en el cultivo e inicio con capital propio, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y ay tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene e sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, pesticidas, etc. asi como muestra en la fotografía para tener una mejor cosecha y asi tener mejores ganancias económicas.
texts.en: Claudia, 36 years old, is a single mother who lives in her own house with her daughter and her father. She works in agriculture, growing corn and sorghum. Her father helps her in the agricultural work. She has 7 years of experience in growing and began with her own capital, she sells her products in the nearby towns and has many customers. With what she earns and her sales, she manages to pay some of the household expenses. She is asking for a loan to purchase fertilizer, manure, pest-control substances, pesticides, etc., as shown int he photograph, to have a better crop and to have more earnings.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, manure, pest-control products, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the fee for putting vehicles in service.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que se esfuerza por poder salir adelante y ser alguien en la vida, ella sigue estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas, comenta que su préstamo anterior de kiva lo uso en poder pagar las clases de su universidad.
Ella hoy pide nuevamente este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Sonia is a hardworking and persistent person, who fights to get ahead and be somebody in life. She is still studying Business Administration and says that she used the previous Kiva loan to pay for university classes.

She is requesting a new loan to pay her tuition fees and be able to continue working as she has been doing so far.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es:
La Señorita Rocio es estudiante, está cursando la carrera de Licenciatura en Enfermería, está casada, y comenta que su esposo siempre la apoya en todo.
Es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora que se viene esforzando para ser alguien en la vida. Quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas por medio de su profesión.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de útiles para su universidad, para poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Rocío is studying to become a nurse. She is married and says that she can count on her husband’s support in everything she does.

She is a hardworking and entrepreneurial person who fights hard to be somebody in life. She wants to be able to help others through her work.

Rocío is requesting a loan to buy study supplies and be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy study supplies.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN DE NATIVIDAD DE PICHINGOTO,el banco esta ubicad en el distrito de Maras, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Edwin tiene 32 años de edad y es soltero, el socio alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura, el socio lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al, empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio desea poder seguir trabajado para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de abono y semillas.
El socio se siente agradecido por  el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus  cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
He is a member of the Virgen de Natividad de Pichingoto communal bank. The bank is located in Maras district, Urubamba province, and Cusco department.

Edwin is 32 years old and single. He alternates his daily tasks, working in agriculture. He has been in his business a good while, which is going well, thanks to the dedication he puts each day into his business. He wants to be able to continue working and in this way continue supporting his family.

He asks for the loan to purchase manure and seeds.

He is grateful for the granted loan and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase manure and seeds.

loans.name: Eloy Guillermo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN DE NATIVIDAD DE PICHINGOTO,el banco esta ubicad en el distrito de Maras, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Eloy Guillermo tiene 46 años de edad  es conviviente y tiene 46 años de edad, el socio alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura, el socio lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio desea poder seguir trabajado para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de abono y semillas.
El socio se siente agradecido por  el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus  cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
He is a member of the Virgen de Natividad de Pichingoto communal bank. The bank is located in Maras district, Urubamba province, and Cusco department.  

Eloy Guillermo is 46 years old, is partnered, and is 46 years old. He alternates his daily tasks while working in agriculture. He has been in his business for a good while, which is going well for him thanks to the dedication he puts into his business each day.  He wants to be able to continue working so that, in this way, he can continue supporting his family.

He asks for the loan to purchase manure and seeds.

He is grateful for the offered loan and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase manure and seeds.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN DE NATIVIDAD DE PICHINGOTO,el banco esta ubicad en el distrito de Maras, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Rosa Maria tiene 28 años de edad tiene 01 hijo y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al, empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajado para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, azúcar entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por  el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus  cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
She is a member of the Virgen de Natividad de Pichingoto communal bank. The bank is located in Maras district, Urubamba province, and Cusco department.  

Rosa Maria is 28 years old, has 1 child and is single. She alternates her daily tasks with her grocery store business. She has been in her business for a good while, which is going well for her thanks to the dedication she puts into her business each day.  She wants to be able to continue working so that, in this way, she can continue supporting her family.

She asks for the loan to purchase rice, sugar, and more.

She is grateful for the offered loan and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, and more.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN DE NATIVIDAD DE PICHINGOTO,el banco esta ubicad en el distrito de Maras, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Alicia tiene 30 años de edad tiene 02 hijos  y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurante, la socia vende comida  a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al, empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajado para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como  arroz, aceite entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por  el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus  cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
She is a member of the Virgen de Natividad de Pichingoto communal bank. The bank is located in Maras district, Urubamba province, and Cusco department.  

Alicia is 30 years old, has 2 children and is single. She alternates her daily tasks with her restaurant business. She sells food to customers who ask for it. She has been in her business for a good while, which is going well for her thanks to the dedication she puts into her business each day.  She wants to be able to continue working so that, in this way, she can continue supporting her family.

She asks for the loan to purchase supplies such as rice, oil, and more.

She is grateful for the offered loan and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as rice, oil and more.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
Justina tiene 53 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene tres hijos, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales menores como actividades económicas principales.

Ella se dedica a brindar los servicios de confección de ropa así como a la compra y venta de ropa, contando con herramientas propias, con más de 1 año de experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes dan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. El crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de tela y más ropa para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Justina espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de ropa a sus clientes lo que le permitirá incrementar sus ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia
texts.en:
Justina, 53 years old, is a single mother of three children. She and her family live in the Oyotún district, in a rural area located in the Chiclayo province, in the Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Perú. The inhabitants of this district make a living in agriculture, trade, and selling and raising small animals.  

Justina earns a living by making clothing as well as buying and selling clothes. She owns her own tooks and has been working in this business for over a year. Justina has loyal customers who give great personal and professional references for her. This loan will help Justina to buy a larger quantity of fabric and more clothing to increase her business' stock. Justina hopes this will help her to offer a wider variety of clothing to her customers, which will allow her to increase her income and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of fabric and more clothing to increase her business' stock.

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline has six children and is hardworking. She used her previous loan to buy more shoes and clothes to sell. She is still doing well with her business and is looking forward to building rental houses in future. She is faced with the hardship of customers not paying on time, which hinders the growth of her business. 

Jackline requested for another loan, which she will use to buy second-hand clothes and shoes to sell.

loans.use: to purchase second-hand clothes and shoes

loans.name: Francisco Jose

texts.es:
El resultado de la cosecha de Francisco se logra apreciar sobre sus manos al sostener parte de su siembra de chiltoma, trabajo que con más de quince años le ha creado un nombre por su excelente agricultura. Él se siente muy agradecido con las personas que lo apoyaron con el préstamo pasado, puesto que con él pudo comprar abono de calidad para obtener buenos resultados. 
Francisco de 59 años de edad, siente que el fruto de sus cosechas cada vez va mejorando, este es el mejor momento para iniciar su siguiente cosecha, por lo que no duda ni un segundo en seguir invirtiendo en su negocio como agricultor. Por esta razón solicita un nuevo préstamo para comprar abono, herramientas de riego y semilla de sandía para aprovechar que se aproxima el invierno. Con esto no solo logrará en obtener una fruta de calidad, sino también seguirá creciendo laboralmente.
texts.en:
The result of Francisco's harvest can be appreciated in his hands, which hold part of his green pepper crop, work that in over more than fifteen years, he has made a name for his excellent farming. He is very grateful to the people who supported him with his past loan, given that with it he could buy quality manure to have good results. 

Fransisco, 59 years old, feels that the fruit of his harvests improve each time. This is the best moment to start his next crop, so he doesn't hesitate even a second in continuing to invest in his business as a farmer. For this reason, he asks for a new loan to purchase manure, irrigation tools, and watermelon seeds, to take advantage of the the approaching winter. With this, he not only will manage to get quality fruit, but also will continue growing in his work.

loans.use: to purchase manure, irrigation tools, and watermelon seeds.

loans.name: Tania

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS HORMIGUITAS.
La socia Tania tiene 35 años de edad tiene 02 hijos  y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ladrillos, la socia vende   a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al, empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajado para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de ladrillos para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por  el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus  cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Tania belongs to the communal bank group called "Las Hormiguitas." She is 35 years old and has two children. Tania is single and splits her time between her daily activities and her business selling bricks. Tania sells bricks to customers who order them. She has been working in this business for a long time and things have gone well for her thanks to the dedication she shows each day. She hopes to continue working in this way in order to keep supporting her family. 

Tania is requesting this loan in order to buy bricks for her business. She is grateful for the loan and pledges to complete all of the scheduled repayments.

loans.use: to buy bricks for her business.

loans.name: Melodina

texts.en:
Melodina has always had enthusiasm for farming. She has cultivated their rice land in Guipos, Zamboanga del Sur and has yielded good earnings doing this type of work.

Recently, Melodina applied for a loan to purchase bags of fertilizer and a knapsack sprayer. She knew that she has to get things right to yield more income for this cropping season.

In the future, Melodina hopes to buy more rice land to cultivate for additional earnings for the family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer and a knapsack sprayer.

loans.name: Leyla Del Socorro

texts.es:
Al entrar a la pulpería de Leyla de nuevo, las personas miran el avance que ha tenido esta mujer luchadora de 57 años de edad con su negocio y con su hogar. Su piso ahora es de cerámica y su pulpería ahora es más amplia gracias al aumento de ingresos que tuvo en la temporada pasada. Esta comerciante expresa su agradecimiento a todos los que la apoyaron con el préstamo anterior, puesto que comenta cómo la inversión en la compra de mercadería de arroz, leche, frijoles, aceite, entre otros productos de venta diaria le ha permitido ir ahorrando para hacer esas mejoras que tanto deseaba.
Sin embargo, hasta ahí no llega todo. Esta emprendedora desea seguir invirtiendo, por lo que solicita un nuevo préstamo para  aumentar su mercadería, comprar arroz, maíz, aceite, verduras, sopas, pasta de dientes, frijoles, azúcar, entre otros. Con esto Leyla podrá seguir ahorrando para continuar construyendo en su hogar y cumplir con las metas que tanto sueña.
texts.en:
Upon entering Leyla's store again, customers view how far this woman has come. She is 57 years old and has her business and her home. The floor is now ceramic and her store is wider, thanks to the increased income she earned this past season. This businesswoman is very grateful to all those who supported her through the previous loan. She comments that the investment allowed her to buy merchandise such as rice, milk, beans, oil, and other basic items. Selling these has allowed her to save enough to make the renovations that she desired. 

Nevertheless, she still has a ways to go. This businesswoman wants to keep investing, which is why she is requesting this new loan. She wants to increase her merchandise, buying rice, corn, oil, vegetables, soup, toothpaste, beans, sugar, and other items. With this, Leyla will be able to continue saving to keep building her house and complete the goals she has dreamed of.

loans.use: to buy rice, corn, oil, vegetables, soups, toothpaste, beans, sugar, and other items.

loans.name: Laureta

texts.en:
Laureta has started her small-time business and became a boss with her sari-sari (variety) store. She has managed to have enough inventory and roll up her capital to gain more profit. Every day she makes good sales, since she has the only store in their barangay (village).

Recently, she approached Paglaum for much-needed capital to restock her store with basic commodities.

In the future, she hopes to obtain a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce.

loans.name: Pedrita

texts.en:
Pedrita is 65 years old and lives in Map-an, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with five children now at their adult age. 

Pedrita has been engaged in managing her own copra trading business for 30 years already. She earns approximately 3,000 PHP each month doing this type of business activity. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional sacks of copra for reselling. 

Pedrita has been a member of PMPC for 11 years. In the future, Pedrita hopes to become a more progressive copra trader in the area.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of copra for reselling

loans.name: Dickson

texts.en:
Dickson is 33 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. He is married and has two children, one school-aged and one an infant.

Dickson earns income as an operator of a single-sitter motorcycle-for-hire. He's been in the business for almost four years and earns approximately PHP 5,000 per month, which is so helpful to meet the needs of his family.

Dickson requested a loan to pay the annual registration of his for-hire motorcycle. He has been a member of PMPC for three years.

In the future, Dickson hopes to expand his business by acquiring additional motorcycles.

loans.use: to pay the annual registration of his for-hire motorcycle.

loans.name: Eden

texts.en:
Eden is 49 years old and lives in Sinara Alto, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is widowed with 3 children who are now adults. 

Eden earns a living from her dried fish vending business. She has been engaged in this business for 10 years. Eden earns approximately 5,000 PHP each month from this business and this amount is so helpful to meet her needs. 

She has requested a loan to purchase additional stock of dried fish for retailing. Eden has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. 

In the future, Eden hopes to expand her dried fish vending business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of dried fish.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS HORMIGUITAS.
La socia Victoria tiene 55 años de edad tiene 04 hijos  y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ladrillos, la socia vende   a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al, empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajado para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de ladrillos para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por  el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus  cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Victoria belongs to the communal bank group called "Las Hormiguitas." She is 55 years old and has four children. She is married and splits her time between her daily activities and in her business selling bricks. Victoria sells bricks to customers who order them. She has been working in this business for a long time and things have gone well for her thanks to the dedication she shows each day. 

Victoria hopes to be able to continue working and, in this way, support her family. She is requesting this loan in order to buy bricks for her business. She is very grateful for this loan and pledges to make all of the scheduled repayments.

loans.use: to buy bricks for her business.

loans.name: Beth

texts.en:
Beth is 53 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is widowed with one child, who is now an adult. 

Beth is engaged in managing her own sari-sari (general) store and a vulcanizing shop business. She's been in this business for 1 year and earns approximately 3,000 PHP each month from it. 

She has requested a loan to purchase tires, tubes, rubber gums and other accessories for her vulcanizing shop business. Beth has been a member of PMPC for nine years. 

In the future, Beth hopes to expand her sari-sari store and vulcanizing shop business.

loans.use: to purchase tires, tubes, rubber gums and other accessories for her vulcanizing business.

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
Mario is 65 years old and lives in Taraka, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He is widowed with 3 children. 

Mario operates a restaurant business and earns approximately 10,000 PHP each month. He's been in this business for 5 years. 

He has requested a loan to purchase additional kilos of meat, beef, chicken and spices for his business. Mario has been a member of PMPC for almost 5 years. 

In the future, Mario hopes to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional kilos of meat, beef, chicken and spices.

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
Mario is 63 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He is widowed with three adult children. Mario earns a living from a sand and gravel quarrying business. He's been in the business for more than two years already and earns approximately 5,000 PHP each month doing this type of work.

Mario has requested a loan to purchase marine boards, epoxy, nails and paints to repair the sampan (boat carrier for transport) he uses in his quarrying business. Mario has been a member of PMPC almost four years.

In the future, Mario hopes to expand his sand and gravel quarrying business by acquiring additional sampans.

loans.use: to purchase marine boards, epoxy, nails and paints.

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose is a farmer and has a banana farm in Pagadian, Philippines, which is the primary source of income for his family. To generate additional earnings, he wants to plant more bananas and grow root crops. Jose makes it a point to have good land preparation to have maximum yield and a good income.

Jose recently needed a loan to pay for clearing and plowing land and digging and planting seedlings, which he borrowed from Paglaum MPC.

Jose wishes to have more produce and be able to supply agri-products in the market.

loans.use: to pay for clearing and plowing land and digging and planting seedlings.

loans.name: Eliza

texts.en:
Eliza is 58 years old and lives in Sumasap, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with four children now at their adult age. 

Eliza has been engaged in the buying and selling of pigs for lechon (a pork dish) for more than 10 years already. She earns approximately 3,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to be used in paying the tuition fees of her graduating son in college. 

Eliza has been a member of PMPC for four years already. In the future, Eliza hope to establish her own lechon hauz business.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees

loans.name: Jose Jr.

texts.en:
Jose is 61 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. He is married with three children who are now grown adults. Jose has earned a living from agri-business, particularly in a rice production activity, for 20 years already. He earns approximately PHP 8,000 each month from doing this type of work. 

He has requested a loan to be used in purchasing commercial fertilizers and sprays for his agri-business. Jose has been a member of PMPC for 10 years. In the future, Jose hopes to expand his rice production activity by acquiring more parcels of rice land.

loans.use: to purchase commercial fertilizers and sprays

loans.name: Libertad

texts.en:
Libertad is 63 years old, married and lives at Sapang Dalaga, Philippines. 

In order to earn a living she takes in and raises pigs from her neighborhood.  The piglets' owners share in the profit upon sale, to be divided 60/40 or 70/30 depending on their agreement.  With a desire to earn more, she decided to raise pigs on her own as well. 

Through PMPC she obtained the capital to purchase her original piglets and feed. Now, she requests a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy additional feed. 

In addition to the income of her husband, she really hopes and prays that her business will grow and benefit her family. Someday, she wants to build a concrete pig cage to easily keep more sanitary conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed.

loans.name: Luzvilla

texts.en:
Luzvilla is 66 years old and lives in Sepac, Sapang Dalaga, Philippines. She is married with four children. She sells bananas to earn a living and has had this business for eight years.

Luzvilla has requested a loan to purchase more bananas to sell. Luzvilla has been a member of PMPC for three years.

In the future, Luzvilla hopes to save for emergencies.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of banana

loans.name: Dalvi Carolina

texts.es:
Emprendedora y decidida es Dalvi, una joven de veintiséis años de edad, egresada de la carrera administración de empresa y ahora estudiante de la maestría en Gerencia Social. Ella siempre busca como abrir puertas en el ámbito profesional. Su madre, quien es directora de finanzas de una organización del estado y su padre jefe de seguridad de una empresa, le han inculcado desde muy pequeña que la mejor forma de salir adelante es el trabajar duro. 
Ahora que ella está a la mitad de su maestría, solicita a Kiva y MiCrédito le brinden un préstamo que le permita costear los años que le hacen falta y así culminar con honores. Desea convertirse en una profesional de éxito que contribuye al desarrollo de su país. En un futuro ella se ve trabajando para organizaciones que les importe erradicar la pobreza o  en la elaboración de proyectos que mejoren la sociedad en la que vivimos.
texts.en:
Dalvi is hard working and decisive. She is 26 years old and enrolled in a program of Business Administration. She is currently seeking her Masters in Human Resources. She is always looking for new ways to open doors in her professional development.

Her mother is the director of finances at a state organization and her father is chief of security for a business. They have taught her from a young age the best way to get ahead in life is to work hard.

She is currently half way through her degree and she is asking Kiva and MiCredito for a loan that will allow her to pay tuition costs. She wants to be a successful business woman and contribute to the continuing development of her country. In the future, she see herself working for organizations that seek to eliminate poverty or in projects that seek to improve society.

loans.use: pay tuition costs.

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en:
Emelia is 60 years old and lives in Sepac, Sapang Dalaga, Philippines. She is married with five children. Emelia has a sari-sari (variety) store and has had this business for five years.

Emelia requested a loan to buy two piglets and two sacks of feed for another source of income. She has been a member of PMPC for two years.

In the future, Emelia hopes to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy two piglets and two sacks of feed.

loans.name: Xochilt Margarita

texts.es:
Xóchitl es una mujer de veintidós años de edad, apasionada por la elaboración de medicamentos y la química. Actualmente cursa su último año de la licenciatura en farmacia. Esta joven además de ser estudiante, es esposa y madre de un niño de dos años de edad, también es emprendedora, en las noches tiene un negocio en el cual vende comida. Apoyada por su madre, quien migró a otro país en busca de mejores oportunidades, ha logrado salir adelante en su carrera. 
Ahora que Xóchitl está a un paso de ver consagrada su carrera universitaria, solicita la ayuda de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, mediante un préstamo que le permitirá pagar su curso de titulación y los tramites del diploma. En un futuro no muy lejano ella planea montar su propia farmacia, además piensa estudiar un postgrado en farmacología. Ella desea ser una profesional exitosa en primer lugar,para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y en segundo para contribuir al desarrollo de la sociedad.
texts.en:
Xóchitl is 22 years old and passionate about making medicines and about chemistry. She is currently in her final year of her undergraduate studies in Pharmacy studies. She is also a wife and mother of a child who is 2 years old. She is also enterprising and at night she runs her own business where she sells food. Supported by her mother, who migrated to this country in search of better opportunities, she has been able to get ahead.

Now, Xóchitl is one step away from finishing her university studies and she is asking Kiva and MiCredito for a loan that will allow her to pay tuition costs and diploma fees.

In the not so far away future, she plans on opening her own pharmacy and she also wants to go on to graduate school. Her first wish is to be successful in her career and to also improve her family's quality of life. Her second wish is to help to contribute to the continued development of society.

loans.use: pay tuition costs and diploma fees.

loans.name: Karla Juniette

texts.es:
Karla es una joven de veintitrés años de edad, muy solidaria, bondadosa y  compasiva. Estudia la licenciatura enfermería, porque su más grande pasión es poder ayudar a los enfermos. Además, es madre soltera de un niño de siete años de edad, quien es su principal inspiración para salir adelante. Impulsada y apoyada por su madre, quien es profesora de escuela secundaria, inició hace un par de años a estudiar en la universidad, enfocada en el tipo de profesional que quiere ser en un futuro.
En la actualidad los trabajos de clases que le orientan a Karla, requieren ser hechos en una computadora portátil, ya que este artefacto tecnológico es muy importante para un estudiante. Por este motivo, esta carismática mujer, solicita a Kiva y MiCrédito un préstamo, con este podrá comprar una laptop, para seguir desarrollándose en su carrera tan bien y disciplinadamente como lo ha hecho hasta ahora. La principal de las muchas metas que tiene esta joven es terminar sus estudios he insertarse en el mundo laboral, retribuyéndole a su madre, todo el sacrificio que ha hecho por ella.
texts.en:
Karla is 22 years old, generous and compassionate. She is studying to be a nurse because her biggest passion is to help those who are ill. She is also a single mother of a 7 year old child, who is her primary inspiration for wanting to achieve more.

Supported by her mother, who is a teacher in a secondary school, she began her university studies a couple years ago and has been focusing on the type of professional she wants to be in the future.

Currently, because of the kind of work she needs to do to complete for her classes, Karla needs a laptop computer. And so, this charismatic young woman is asking for a loan through Kiva and MiCredito so can purchase a computer that will help her to continue to focus on her career and studies in the same disciplined way she has up to the present.

The goal behind all that she does is to finish her studies and to enter the workforce, giving back to her mother all that she has sacrificed for her.

loans.use: purchase a laptop.

loans.name: Brundabati Group

texts.en:
The following group, named Brundabati, was formed in 2015 by twelve active and self-dependent women of Shripali village with the objective of developing their existing businesses. All the members of this group have their own profession. Sobhashini is one of them. 

The lady seated second from right in the front row with a green saree in the photo is Sobhashini. She is 35 years old and living with her husband and two children. Sobhashini has been doing a paddy (rice) business from her own home of Shripali village for the last six years. She is doing paddy trading. She earns a monthly income of 8,000 INR. 

Sobhashini says, although she is earning a striking income, it is not sufficient to maintain the family, invest in the business, and materialize her dreams. So to get more income by expanding her business, Sobhashini has planned to improve her trading with the present loan. She purchased a huge quantity of paddy from the market for her benefit, after disbursement of the loan. She hopes to save money for construction of a house and to provide better education for her children.

The other eleven members of her group are also doing small enterprises like vegetable vending, milk business, popped rice business, general store, and transport business, and with this loan, they hope to enhance their livelihoods.

loans.use: to purchase paddy (rice) for trading

loans.name: Ana Carola

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer de 33 años de edad, vive con su pareja, sin hijos, y su negocio es la venta de sopa de pollo y refresco.
Ella es emprendedora, optimista, paciente, de buena actitud, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla de forma ambulante en la zona central un área caracterizada por el comercio en todos los rubros, donde; restaurantes, librerías, hoteles, mercados, oficinas, galerías, universidades, etc., conviven lado a lado, de clima cálido tropical con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 22 – 35 grados centígrados.
Ana es de tez morena, cabello castaño largo lo usa amarrado, ojos pardos, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza.  Su vida la realiza con su pareja que trabaja como constructor, viven en un cuarto alquilado construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con energía eléctrica, agua potable y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de sopa de pollo y refresco frío de forma ambulante; empujando un carrito de 2 ruedas, donde tiene una olla grande envuelta en tela gruesa para conservar el calor, al lado un recipiente con hielo para enfriar los refrescos. Actividad que realiza de lunes a viernes a la hora de almuerzo, porque los fines de semana la zona se queda con muy poca actividad y las ventas son muy pocas. “trabajo independientemente y tengo clientes en construcciones, donde les llevo el almuerzo a diario…” comenta. Su sueño es establecerse en su zona y seguir trabajando con clientes en construcciones, ella desea ampliar su negocio mediante la compra de un carrito hamburguesero para trabajar por las noches. Estos carritos son muy populares porque fríen la hamburguesa y  también hacen papas fritas con las que se acompaña. Esta es su 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que viene desarrollando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Ana solicita un préstamo para la compra de un carrito hamburguesero para vender hamburguesas con papas fritas por las noches.
texts.en:
Ana, age 33, lives with her life partner and does not have children.  Her business is selling chicken soup and soft drinks.  She is enterprising, optimistic, patient, responsible, and hard-working, and has a good attitude.  She conducts her business in an itinerant manner in the central zone.  The area is known for all types of commerce where restaurants, bookstores, hotels, markets, offices, galleries, and universities, etc. coexist side by side.  It has a hot, tropical climate with a temperature that varies between 22 and 35 degrees centigrade in the daytime.  

Ana has a dark complexion, long chestnut hair that she wears tied back.  She is short and has a medium physique.  Her maternal language is Guaraní, which she speaks with her family.  She speaks Spanish with the general public and for her business.  She shares her life with her life partner, who is a builder.  They live in a rented room that is built from brick and cement and has a metal sheeting roof.  They have electricity, running water, and indoor plumbing.

Her business is selling chicken soup and cold soft drinks in an itinerant manner.  She pushes a two wheeled cart where she has a large pot wrapped in thick fabric to conserve the heat.  To the side she has a container of ice to chill the soft drinks.  She conducts her business Mondays through Fridays at lunch time.  On the week-ends the area is left with very little activity, and there are very few sales.  “I work independently, and I have customers who work in construction where I take lunch every day,” she says.

Her dream is to establish herself in her area and to continue working with construction customers.  She wishes to expand her business by purchasing a hamburger cart in order to work in the evenings.  These carts are very popular because they fry hamburgers and also make French fries to go with them.
This is her first loan cycle with the institution in the one year that she has been engaged in this business activity.  It is for these reasons that Ana is requesting a loan to buy a hamburger cart in order to sell hamburgers with French fries in the evenings.

loans.use: to buy a hamburger cart in order to sell hamburgers with French fries in the evenings.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS HORMIGUITAS.
La socia Roxana  tiene 26 años de edad y es soltera , la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ladrillos, la socia vende   a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al, empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajado para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de ladrillos para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por  el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus  cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Roxana belongs to the communal bank group called "Las Hormiguitas." She is 26 years old and is not married. She splits her time between her daily activities and in her business selling bricks. Roxana sells bricks to customers who order them. She has been working in this business for a long time and things have gone well for her thanks to the dedication she shows each day. 

Roxana hopes to be able to continue working and, in this way, support her family. She is requesting this loan in order to buy bricks for her business. She is very grateful for this loan and pledges to make all of the scheduled repayments.

loans.use: to buy bricks for her business.

loans.name: Ruly Brigida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS HORMIGUITAS.
La socia Brigida  tiene 36 años de edad  es soltera  y tiene 03 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurante, la socia vende comida  a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al, empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajado para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como aceite, arroz entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por  el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus  cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Brigida belongs to the communal bank group called "Las Hormiguitas." She is 36 years old. She is not married and has three children. She splits her time between her daily activities and her restaurant business. Brigida sells food to customers who order it. She has been working in this business for a long time and things have gone well for her thanks to the dedication she shows each day. 

Brigida hopes to be able to continue working and, in this way, support her family. She is requesting this loan in order to buy supplies for her business such as oil, rice, and other items. She is very grateful for this loan and pledges to make all of the scheduled repayments.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as oil, rice, and other items.

loans.name: Perla

texts.en:
Perla is 57 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with four children now at their adult age. 

Perla earns a living from a dried fish vending business. She’s been engaged in this business for 10 years already. Perla earns approximately 15,000 PHP each month doing this type of business activity. 

She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional stock of dried fish for retailing. Perla has been a member of PMPC since just this year. In the future, Perla hopes to expand her dried fish vending business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of dried fish

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es:
El socio  pertenece al banco comunal LAS HORMIGUITAS, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Rafael  tiene 62 años de edad es soltero y tiene 03 hijos, el socio alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a realizar transporte de  materiales de construcción, el socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, él socio  es una persona responsable, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio  solicita el crédito para la compra de  ladrillos.
texts.en:
Rafael belongs to the communal bank group called "Las Hormiguitas." This bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco, and in the department of Cusco. Rafael is 62 years old, not married, and has three children. He splits his time between his daily activities and in his business transporting construction supplies. Rafael is grateful for this loan and pledges to make all of the scheduled repayments. He is a responsible person. This is how he works to help his family get ahead. 

Rafael is requesting this loan in order to buy bricks.

loans.use: to buy bricks.

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en:
Rosie is 53 years old, married and lives in Pagadian. She and her husband have a retail business, buying and selling assorted products. She has a good return doing this type of business activity, enabling her to support her family needs, most especially the education of her six children.

To generate additional earnings, Rosie also offers manicure/pedicure services. She is now well known for the nice quality of services she offers. She has already purchased some new manicure sets and was able to save from it. This kind of service is self-sustainable and has become profitable, with a net profit of about PHP 3,000 per month.

Rosie wants to improve her business, so she is seeking a PHP 14,000 loan. She would like to use the loan to purchase special items for hair treatment and foot spa services. Rosie is very diligent and loves accuracy, which only adds to the effective management of her venture.

loans.use: to purchase special items for hair treatment and foot spa services

loans.name: Nellie

texts.en:
Nellie is a very hard-working mother of three children. She has a sari-sari (variety) store as her primary source of income. She decided to expand her income by starting another business.

Nellie requested a loan from Paglaum to pay for labor to plow the land and to purchase a variety of fruits.

Nellie hopes and prays that her business will grow and leave her in the position to help others.

loans.use: to pay for labor to plow the land and to buy a variety of fruits.

location.town: Calamba-Sapang Ama Sapang Dalaga Misamis Occidenta

loans.name: Raymunda

texts.en:
To earn a living, Raymunda runs a small eatery. From a desire to earn more, she also sells longganisa (processed meat).

Her business did well when she doubled her time perfecting her own longganisa recipe. With her husband's help, she has maximized her profits and keeps pursuing her goals for the good of her family.

Raymunda availed another loan from PMPC to buy more kilos of meat for her longganisa and eatery business.

Today, Raymunda is able to help others do retailing business on her longganisa, and they as well earned for their own families.

loans.use: to buy more kilos of meat for her "longganisa"  and eatery business

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.en:
Emiliana has mastered her swine-production and hog-raising business in Balangasan District. This is how she makes a living and is able to support her family, in addition to her husband's income.

Emiliana was at her lowest point when she didn't have enough capital for her business. When she joined PMPC, she was truly grateful to avail credit to fully support her business.

Just as she takes care of her hog-raising business, so it is with her membership with PMPC. She wants to maintain her membership in good standing so she can always cover any financing needs. A loan of PHP 10,000 will help her purchase five bags of hog-finishing feed and three bags of gestation feed for swine.

Emiliana hopes to open a meat shop this year in the market.

loans.use: to purchase five bags of hog-finishing feed and three bags of gestation feed for swine.

location.town: Pagadian - Balangasan District,  Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia has agricultural land in Pagadian. She and her husband are both farmers. They plant corn, vegetables, and other crops. Lilia makes good earnings doing this type of work, which is the primary source of income for her family. To expand her resources, Lilia makes it a point to prepare the land well for planting dwarf coconut and banana seedlings, as well as root crops. This preparation gives her the maximum yield and generates a good income.

Recently, Lilia needed an amount to pay for clearing land, digging the soil, and planting seedlings, which she borrowed from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative.

Lilia wishes to sustain her business and to provide her family with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to pay for clearing land, digging holes, and planting seedlings.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Bonifacia

texts.en:
Bonifacia learned about Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative and the financial assistance it gives for business start-ups. Bonifacia tried her luck with a business focusing on her farming activities. She feels she owes her fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used as capital.

Bonifacia borrowed another amount to pay for seedlings and compost. This will help give her farming income a big boost.

Bonifacia looks for better business opportunities and hopes to improve and expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to pay for seedlings and compost

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Eluminada

texts.en: After becoming a member of Paglaum Cooperative and learning about the programs and services offered to its members, Eluminada decided to apply for a loan to develop her skills in flower gardening and buy fertilizer and compost. She enjoys the scene of her backyard, seeing the variety of flowers for sale. What she likes in this flower business is that it helps her house looks attractive and, at the same time, increases her income and helps support the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and compost for her flower garden

loans.name: Visitacion

texts.en:
Visitacion is a mother of four children. She loves taking care of their small coco land as part of their primary source of income. She has been a member of Paglaum for five years with good credit standing.  

Visitacion has requested a loan at Paglaum to pay labor for holing and planting different types of bananas. Visitacion hopes that through cultivating the land, it helps to increase their income for saving.

loans.use: to pay for labor for planting bananas

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is responsible and dedicated in her work as a tailor. This is her only source of income, and she is very grateful for her life and being allowed to be independent. She has a business producing school uniforms and carrying out repairs to clothes. This business has given her the opportunity to work and survive.

She applied for a loan in order to expand her business and increase production. She will buy additional textiles, buttons and sewing supplies. This will allow her to generate more income and be able to provide tailoring services.

loans.use: to buy additional textiles, buttons and sewing supplies

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is engaged in running a grocery store. She has been operating her business for five years and earns a monthly net income of 3,500 PHP. 

Marivic is 39 years old, married and has three school-aged children. She is from Tuburan, Pagadian, in the Philippines. 

Marivic joined PMPC to gain access to insurance and financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. 

Marivic has successfully repaid her previous loan from PMPC. Now, Marivic is requesting another loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used for the expansion of her existing business. She wants to buy more grocery items and various food commodities to sell.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items and various food commodities to sell

location.town: Pagadian - Tuburan, Pagadian City Zamboanga Del Su

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina, age 57, is from Mahayag, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is married with four children. 

Marcelina joined PMPC, and she appreciates the programs and services of the Coop. Her husband is a farmer. Marcelina learned about Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative and the financial assistance it gives as business startups. The Coop has supported her by providing the capital to start her farming business, focusing on rice and corn production. 

Marcelina is now trying to expand her resources, and she decided to engage in s sari-sari (small grocery) store business for additional earnings. She presented her project proposal to Paglaum MPC to finance the project and has applied for a loan of 40,000 PHP to purchase grocery items for her store. She is thankful to Paglaum MPC for financing her capital needs. In addition, she wants her business to be well known and to build a good business management for her loyal customers.  

With her extra income, she wishes to live a happy and comfortable life with adequate income.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items for her store

loans.name: Millie

texts.en:
Millie is 62 years old and resides at Tubauran, Pagadian. She is married and blessed with five adult children. Millie sells a variety of food products and grocery items in the local community.

Millie joined PMPC in order to access the programs and services of the coop. She is seeking a loan of PHP 3,000 for additional working capital to buy a variety of commodities for her existing business.

loans.use: to buy a variety of commodities.

location.town: Pagadian-Tuburan, Pagadian City Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Saliya

texts.ru: Салия, 54 года, замужем, 6 детей. У Салии средне-специальное образование. Около 15 лет назад начала заниматься животноводством и продает оптом фрукты и овощи. Благодаря упорному труду Салии, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы и 2 тонны яблок для продажи. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Салия обратилась в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в ремонт дома и свадьбу сына.
texts.en: Saliya is 54, married, and has six children. She has a secondary vocational education. She started raising livestock and selling fruits and vegetables wholesale about 15 years ago. Thanks to her hard work, she currently has two cows and two tons of apples to sell. In order to expand her business, Saliya applied for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy livestock to increase her headcount. She plans to use her profits to renovate her house and pay for her son's wedding.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy uniforms and school supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Ramon

texts.es:
Ramon tiene 43 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 04 hijos dependientes, vive con ellos y con su cónyuge en el distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Es una comunidad mediana cuyas actividades principales son el comercio y la agricultura.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte en el distrito de Pucará y zonas cercanas, esta actividad la viene realizando hace más de 01 año, contando con experiencia en este negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Adicionalmente el brinda servicios agrícolas como peón. El préstamo será para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento de su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Ramon espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir incrementar sus ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ramon is 43 years old. He is in a common law marriage and has 4 dependent children and lives with them and his wife in the Pucará district located in the Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru. It is a medium sized community whose main activities are commerce and agriculture.

He is dedicated to providing transport in the Pucará district and nearby areas. He has been doing this activity for more than a year, and has experience in the field and has many good personal and work references in the area. He also offers his services as an agricultural laborer. His loan will be used to make repairs and for maintenance of his vehicle as it is currently in poor condition. Ramon hopes this will permit him to increase his earnings and thus improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to make repairs and for maintenance to his vehicle that currently is in poor condition

loans.name: Guardina

texts.es:
Gurdina, tiene la edad de 60 años, está casado. Actualmente vive con su esposo solamente. Ella con el credito quiere comprar mas gallinas ponedoras. Ella actualmente cuenta con unas que le producen huevos para sus ventas, pero quiere aumentar su produccion pues hay una muy buena demanda del producto. Ella cuenta con los gallinero ya establesidos y con la clientela que es lo importante. Ella espera poder obtener la ayuda y asi poder comprar sus gallinas para generasr mas produccion e ingresos economicos para el bienestar de ella y su esposo pues el no puede trabajar.

Es el segundo préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Guardina is 60-years old and married. She currently lives with only her husband.

With this loan, she wants to buy more laying hens.
