Imad is a 29-year-old married man from Dier El balah. He is the father of two sons and three daughters. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This income barely covers his family needs. He also has a blacksmith workshop in the city. It is a very good business and Imad dreams of opening a bigger workshop in the future.

Imad took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more raw materials for his blacksmith workshop. By taking this loan, Imad will be able to increase his productivity and also his income.

Imad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials for his blacksmith workshop.

loans.name: Fuatino

texts.en: Fuatino is 21 years old and divorced with 2 children. She owns and operates a small flea market selling a variety of items. She has been doing this for 1 year. Fuatino needs a loan to buy Samoan carved kava bowls, elei printed material, samoan shirts, slippers and carved earrings and bangles. She hopes to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses and help with the expansion of her business. She became a member of SPBD in 2015 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy samoan carved kava bowls, elei printed material, samoan shirts, slippers and carved earrings and bangles

loans.name: Taulau

texts.en: Taulau is a 49 year-old widow with 7 children. She runs a small canteen in her community to earn a living. She has 4 years of experience with this business. Taulau needs a loan to buy sandwiches, pies, donuts, snacks, coffee, a large boiler and soft drinks. She plans to use her profits to help with her family's weekly expenses. Taulau has been a member of SPBD since 2011.

loans.use: to buy sandwiches, pies, donuts, snacks, coffee, a large boiler and soft drinks

loans.name: Tafaoga

texts.en: Tafaoga is 50 years old and married with six children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 11 years. Tafaoga needs a loan to buy a new wheelbarrow, chemicals, sprayers, a machete, overalls and new boots. She has been a member of SPBD since 2004. Tafaoga will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy a new wheelbarrow, chemicals, sprayers, a machete, overalls and new boots

loans.name: Saomalie

texts.en: Saomalie is a 52 year old widow with 4 children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 5 years. Saomalie needs a loan to buy fertilizer, chemicals, gloves, sprayers, crops, a tiller and a machete. She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. Saomalie will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, chemicals, gloves, sprayers, crops, a tiller and a machete

loans.name: Alisi

texts.en:
Alisi is 47 years old and married with five children. She has a small garden where she grows a variety of flowers for familes in need of bouquets, so she sells in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for four years. 

Alisi needs a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, weed killers, sprayers, a sprinkler, seeds and pot plants. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. Alisi will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer, weed killers, sprayers, a sprinkler, seeds and pot plants

loans.name: Virgen De Nazareth Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Virgen de Nazareth está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, se formó en la ciudad de Concepción, una zona aun en crecimiento, con poco acceso y muy alejado de la capital del país. 
La Sra.  Elodia es una de las integrantes, ella se dedica a la costura, hace todo tipo de confecciones, y ya tiene muchos clientes que siempre les hace mucho pedidos. Debido a que siempre hace muy buenos trabajos, ya tiene muy buena clientela. Ella quiere seguir esforzándose por poder crecer y salir adelante para poder ayudar a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder telas, hilos y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo y sus confecciones. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder ser alguien en la vida.
texts.en:
The group called "Virgen de Nazareth" is in its 2nd cycle on the women's committee program. The group was formed in the city of Concepción. This is an area which is still growing, is not very accessible and is located far away from the country's capital. 

Elodia is one of the group's members. She is a seamstress who produces all types of clothing. She already has many clients who always make many requests. As she always does such a good job, she already has a very good clientele. She want to carry on working hard in order to grow her business and progress so as to be able to help her loved ones. 

She is asking for this loan to buy fabric and thread amongst other things. This is so that she can continue to work and make clothing. She is grateful for the opportunity that will allow her to become someone in life.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread amongst other things.

loans.name: Fazilamo

texts.ru: Фазиламо проживает в городке Куляб. Народ Куляба славится своим не сравнительным стилем гостеприимства и чувство юмора. Фазиласо является одним их тех жителей прекрасного городка. Ей 36 лет. Она замужем и имеет четверых детей. Ее муж строитель и Фазиламо его опора и поддержка во всем и на фотографии он запечатлен. Она старается не отставать от мужа и так же зарабатывать, чтобы прокормить четверых детей и поднять семейный бюджет. Фазиламо в течение 5 лет дома шьет женскую одежду и берет заказы на пошив. На данный момент Фазиламо не имеет возможности дальше продолжить швейную деятельность из-за неполадок со швейной машинкой. Фазиламо посоветовав с мужем, она решилась обратиться за кредитом для приобретения швейной машинки.
texts.en: Fazilamo lives in the town of Kulob. The people of Kulob are famous for their incomparable style of hospitality and sense of humor. Fazilamo is one of the residents of this beautiful town. She is 36 years old, married, and has four children. Her husband, captured in the photograph, is a construction worker and Fazilamo is his source of support for everything. She tries to help her husband and also earn a living to provide for four children and raise the family's income. Fazilamo has been sewing women's clothing at home and accepting orders for sewing for 5 years. At the present time, Fazilamo does not have an ability to continue her sewing business due to issues with her sewing machine. Fazilamo, after seeking advice from her husband, decided to request a loan to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is 53 years old and married with three children. With two children in school, Leonila works very hard to provide for them.

Leonila runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy item to sell in her business like canned goods, shampoo, beverages, home care products and other groceries.

Leonila has been in this business for 21 years now. 

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her business like canned goods, shampoo, beverages, home care products and other groceries

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is 26 years old and married with three children. With one child in school, Virginia works very hard to provide for them.

Virginia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her general store like canned goods, home care products and groceries.

Virginia has been in this business for 2 years now. 

In the future, Virginia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy item to sell in her general store like canned goods, home care products and groceries

loans.name: Rodita

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, Rodita works hard to support her family.

She has a nipa roofing business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from buying and selling root crops. 
Rodita is borrowing PHP 28000 through NWTF to buy materials needed for her business like bamboo stick, etc. for her nipa roofing business.

Rodita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her business like bamboo sticks, etc. for her roofing business

loans.name: Ma. Gene

texts.en:
Ma. Gene is 46 years old and married with four children.

Ma. Gene works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7000 loan through NWTF to buy item to sell in her general store like condiment, beverages, home care products and groceries.

Ma. Gene has borrowed and paid 5 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Ma. Gene aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her general store like condiments, beverages, home care products and groceries

loans.name: Nelida

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Nelida works hard to support her family.

She has a nipa roofing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling root crops. 

Nelida is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy materials needed for her business like bamboo sticks, etc. for her nipa roofing business.

Nelida has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her business like bamboo sticks, etc.

loans.name: Celestino

texts.es:
La sequía es una de las barreras por las que los agricultores pasan en ocasiones. Celestino de 62 años de edad, pasó por esa etapa hace un año, sin embargo su espíritu de superación y de visionario lo llevó a buscar soluciones para tener una excelente producción. Este hombre emprendedor decidió invertir una vez más en su siembra y solicitó un préstamo con el cual compró abono, urea, herramientas para riego y semillas. Él se siente muy agradecido con Kiva, con MiCrédito y con todas las personas que aportaron en ese préstamo, puesto que los resultados fueron muy positivos y pudo sobrellevar esa epidemia.
Celestino es un ejemplo a seguir en la agricultura cultivado maíz, frijoles, ordeñando vacas y sabiendo llevar las barreras que salen en su camino. Ahora la nueva temporada de aproxima y con ello una ciclo con muy buenas expectativas. Por esta razón este agricultor solicita un nuevo préstamo para comprar abono completo y alambre para reparar las cercas de su potrero. Con esto no solo podrá tener una excelente cosecha, sino también podrá cuidar mejor sus vacas. En un futuro sueña con hacer mejoras en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Drought is one of the barriers which farmers occasionally pass through. Celestino, 62 years old, went through that stage a year ago, but his conquering and ambitious spirit led him to look for solutions to an excellent harvest. This enterprising man decided to invest once again sowing and he asked for a loan with which he bought fertilizer, urea, irrigation tools and seeds. He is very grateful to Kiva, MiCrédito, and all the people that contributed to this loan since the results were very positive and he could cope with the epidemic.

Celestino is an example to follow when it comes to growing corn, beans, dairy cows and knowing how to push through the barriers left in his path. Now the new season is approaching and with it a new cycle of high expectations. For this reason this farmer is asking for a new loan in order to buy complete fertilizer and wire to mend fences for his field. With this he will have not only an excellent crop but he can also care better for his cows. He dreams of making home improvements in the future.

loans.use: to buy complete fertilizer and wire for fences

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her husband's dish washing powder and soap sale business

loans.name: Yaroslav

texts.en:
Yaroslav is married and has two sons. Yaroslav has his own business. He used to be addicted to alcohol, but his brother helped him to start a business and begin a new life.

He owns a piece of land where he grows vegetables and wheat. Yaroslav has three heated greenhouses.  He has been working very hard and recently bought a house for his family. 

Yaroslav is asking for a loan of 20,000 UAH to buy coal to heat his greenhouses. He hopes to have great crops this coming season!

loans.use: to buy coal for heating the greenhouses

loans.name: Tatyana

texts.en:
Tatyana is a widow. She has two adult children. Tatyana has her own business.

She has been growing vegetables for 30 years. She has four regular greenhouses and two greenhouses for seedlings. Tatyana used to do her business with her husband. Unfortunatelly, he died few years ago. After recovering from a loss Tatyana continued her business. Her adult children help Tatyana with the work in greenhouses.

Tatyana is asking for a loan of 15,000 UAH to buy fertilizer, film and seeds for greenhouses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, film and seeds for her four greenhouses

loans.name: Santos Rey

texts.es:
Una gran producción de leche y cuajadas hicieron que Santos, de 39 años de edad, se convirtiera en uno de los ganaderos mejor reconocidos en su pueblo. Este hombre con más de 17 años de experiencia en la rama de agricultura y ganadería, explica lo agradecido que se siente con MiCrédito, con Kiva y con todas las personas que le apoyaron con el préstamo anterior donde compró alimento para sus vacas y así obtener ese extraordinario resultado al ordeñar su vacas.
Tras ver esos grandes resultados, no duda ni un segundo en volver a invertir. Por esta razón, este hombre luchador padre de tres hijos y esposo de una mujer que lo apoya siempre, solicita un préstamo nuevo con el cual comprará comida de calidad para sus vacas y para sus terneros. La buena alimentación le permitirá tener a sus animales saludables, lo que le permitirá obtener grandes cantidades de leche para vender y elaborar sus cuajadas. Santos sueña con mejorar su vivienda, por lo que entre sus planes está solicitar un préstamo más adelante para cumplir esa meta.
texts.en:
A large production of milk and curds has meant that Santos, 39 years old, has become one of the most recognised farmers in his town. This man, with more than 17 years experience in the field of agriculture and livestock raising, explains how grateful he is for MiCrédito, for Kiva and for all the people who supported him with his previous loan where he bought feed for his cows, and so obtained that extraordinary result on milking his cows.

After seeing those great results, he does not hesitate for a second in investing again. For this reason, this determined father of three and husband of a woman who always supports him, is asking for a new loan with which he will buy quality feed for his cows and for his calves. The good diet allows him to keep his animals healthy, which allows him to obtain large quantities of milk to sell and to make his curds. Santos dreams of improving his house, and among his plans is to ask for a loan in the future to achieve this goal.

loans.use: to buy feed for cows.

loans.name: Ma. Thelma

texts.en:
Ma. Thelma is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ma. Thelma is 48 years old ,and has one child who is currently in school.

Ma. Thelma has a basket weaving business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,500 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional raw materials for her business.

Ma. Thelma has been in this business for five years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional raw materials for her business

loans.name: Yader Jose

texts.es:
Yader es un hombre de veintiocho años de edad,  esforzado y trabajador, que deja todas sus energías en su tienda, en la cual ofrece granos básicos, productos de limpieza para el hogar, además de ropa usada. Antes él tuvo que migrar a otro país, donde vendía ropa, carteras, fajas, entre otros artículos, de forma ambulante. Con la ganancia de ser vendedor ambulante logro regresarse a su país y poner su propio negocio, para el bienestar de su esposa y pequeña hija de dos años. 
Este ejemplar hombre, cree que su negocio tiene la capacidad de crecer dado que sus clientes le demandan más. Es por eso que Yader solicita a Kiva y MiCrédito un préstamo, para poder invertir más en granos básicos, gaseosas, aceite, artículos de higiene personal, productos de limpieza para el hogar y ropa. En un futuro planea, primeramente ahorrar para la educación de su hija y en segundo lugar construir su negocio para hacerlo más grande.
texts.en:
Yader is a 28 year old man, energetic and hardworking, who puts all his energy into his shop, which offers basic grains, cleaning products for the home and used clothing. Previously he had to migrate to another country, where he sold clothing, wallets and belts among other items as a street vendor. With the profits from being a street vendor he managed to return to his country and start his own business, for the wellbeing of his wife and small two year old daughter.

This exemplary man believes that his business has the capacity to grow, given that his clients are asking for more. This is why Yader is asking Kiva and MiCrédito for a loan, to be able to invest further in basic grains, soft drinks, oil, personal hygiene items, cleaning products for the home and clothes. In the future he plans primarily to save for his daughter's education and secondly to build his business to make it larger.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, soft drinks, oil, personal hygiene items, cleaning products for the home and clothes.

loans.name: Jose Anibal

texts.es:
Los libros de leyes y sobre los derechos humanos, es la herramienta principal de José, un hombre trabajador de 32 años de edad, quien todos los días estudia y trabaja para defender los derechos de las personas. Desde los 19 años de edad se convirtió en padre, lo que los incentivó más a salir adelante y cumplir con sus sueños. Ahora está a punto de culminar sus estudios y de convertirse en Licenciado en Derecho.
José está cursando el quinto año de la carrea universitaria y está a punto de iniciar la etapa final para obtener su título. Por esta razón solicita un préstamo para pagar su curso de titulación. Esto le permitirá gestionar su título que lo nombra licenciado y así podrá optar por un mejor cargo en su trabajo. En sus planes está estudiar un posgrado y seguir adelante con sus metas de convertirse en uno de los mejores en esa área del país.
texts.en:
Books on laws and human rights are José main tools. He is 32 years old and studies and works every day in order to defend the rights of other people. He became a father at the age of 19 years old, which gave him more of an incentive to carry on and achieve his dream. Now he is about to finish his studies and receive a degree in law. 

José is in his fifth year of his university degree and is about to start the final stage of his degree. For this reason he is asking for a loan to pay for his tuition fees. This will allow him to get his degree and therefore obtain a better position in his job. He plans to do postgraduate studies and achieve his goal of becoming one of the best in his area of the country.

loans.use: to pay his university tuition fees.

loans.name: Bothaynah

texts.en:
Bothaynah is a 22-year-old single lady living in Ajloun; she is a fourth year student in university majoring in archaeology.

She is the bigger sister for four brothers, so her parents face some financial problems that led Bothaynah to apply for an educational loan to help her cover the semester fee. 

Bothaynah`s future plan is to find good work so she can help her brothers complete their education.

loans.use: To help her cover the semester fees

loans.name: Olfat

texts.en:
Olfat, 20 years old, lives in Amman. She is a single lady, and she is a second year student majoring foreign languages. Her dad is working as a driver.

Olfat is the eldest of her siblings, thus she feels responsibility for her siblings, whether is moral or financial responsibility. Therefore she wants to finish her education and find good work with good salary to help her parents in anything, even if the assistance is very simple, to be good example of hard worker for her siblings. 

Her family faced some financial problems, and her father could not pay her university fees. Therefore she applied for an educational loan to pay her semester fees and buy what she needs for books and educational supplies.

loans.use: To pay her semester fees and buy what she needs for books and educational supplies.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 21 years old and is studying for a degree in general management. She lives in Irbid with her parents, and she is working really hard to get ahead and to grow.

Nancy dreams of having a good job so that she could help to pay for her daily expenses and help her family in their household expense.
 
She is requested this loan to pay for her educational expenses so that she can continue her education.

loans.use: To pay for her educational expenses

loans.name: Tchassim

texts.fr: Mariée et âgée de 53 ans, Tchassim est une femme qui vit à Ségbé avec ses deux enfants. Tchassim achète et revend du maïs à ses clients pour trouve un revenu nécessaire pour aider son mari. Tchassim s’approvisionne trois fois par mois dans un marché local du quartier. Pour acheter des sacs de maïs afin de disposer d’un stock suffisant, Tchassim demande ce microcrédit pour financer sa commande et faire plus de revenus afin de venir en aide aux besoins de la famille
texts.en:
Tchassim, age 53, is a married mother of two who lives in Ségbé. She buys and sells maize to earn the income necessary to help her husband. She stocks up three times a month at a local market. 

Tchassim wants to buy enough sacks of maize to ensure that she is properly stocked, and she is seeking this loan to pay for her order. This will bolster her income and help to look after the family’s needs.

loans.use: to buy four sacks of maize.

loans.name: Phorn

texts.en:
A citizen from a rural area located in the Phnom Srouch district, where rice farming is a common way to earn a living, Phorn is 53 years old and married. She has struggled to feed her family by farming rice and raising pigs. Having been in the business for several years, the current business earns her approximately 29,000 KHR per day. 

Phorn has been with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for two cycles. Now she is applying for a loan to buy more pigs and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to earn more income so as to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy more pigs and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Speu Province, Phnom Srouch District

loans.name: Kokou

texts.fr: Kokou est un homme marié âgé de 53 ans. Kokou vit à Adidogomé avec sa femme et leurs quatre enfants. Pour assurer les charges de la famille, Kokou vend des produits d’alimentations générales au marché. Ce commerce lui permet de gagner le bénéfice qui pourrait l’aider à répondre aux besoins de la famille. Kokou achète son stock quatre fois par mois. Kokou souhaite acheter des tomates, des boites de lait et des allumettes et sollicite ce prêt pour réaliser ses attentes et promouvoir l’éducation de ses enfants grâce au profit tiré
texts.en:
Kokou, age 53, is a married man who lives in Adidogomé with his wife and their four children. To support his family, Kokou sells general grocery items at the market. Through this commercial activity, he can earn a profit that helps him to look after his family’s needs. 

Kokou buys his stock four times per month. He is seeking this loan to buy tomatoes, cartons of milk and matches. This will help him to achieve his goals and to support his children’s education.

loans.use: to buy 8 cartons of tomatoes, 4 cartons of milk and 2 boxes of matches.

loans.name: Rukhsana Bibi

texts.en: Rukhsana Bibi is an active borrower of BRAC Pakistan. She lives with her five children and husband in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband is the guardian of her family and he has been running his own electrical goods business for the past 3 years. Rukhsana Bibi's husband wants to purchase different types of electrical goods for his business but due to insufficient financial means he is unable to purchase these accessories. Therefore, Rukhsana Bibi has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan, she will enable her husband to purchase relevant electrical goods for his business so that he can maximize profit and better manage his business and household. Rukhsana Bibi is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her husband to purchase electrical goods for his sound system business.

loans.name: Harlandt Jose

texts.es:
Con una sonrisa cálida, Harlant confirma lo feliz que se encuentra por estar estudiando Farmacia, carrera que seleccionó porque le parece interesante el mundo de la medicina y los farmacéuticos. Además siente que es una forma de ayudar a las personas a cuidar su salud. Este joven, quien empezó sus estudios desde los 16 años de edad, ya está en tercer año de la carrera, todo gracias al esfuerzo de sus abuelos, tíos y, por su puesto, de él mismo. 
Harlant de 19 años de edad, cuenta con el apoyo de sus abuelos quienes poseen una pulpería y se siente muy orgullosos de ver salir adelante a su nieto. Ya en tercer año de la carrera de Farmacia, siente que debe estar a la vanguardia con sus herramientas y trabajos universitarios, razón por la cual solicita un préstamo para comprar una computadora. Esta inversión le permitirá realizar las asignaciones en tiempo y forma en sus clases. Este joven soñador pretende en un futuro ser visitador médico y llegar a establecer su propia farmacia.
texts.en:
With a warm smile Harlant happily confirms that he is studying pharmacy, a career that he chose because he is interested in the world of medicine and pharmaceuticals. In addition he feels it is a way to help people look after their own health.

This young man, who began his studies at the age of 16, is already in the third year of his studies, all thanks to the effort of his grandparents, aunties and uncles and of course, himself. Harlant, who is 19 years old, has the support of his grandparents who own a grocery store and feel very proud to see their grandson progress.

Already in the third year of his pharmacy studies, he feels that he should be up to date with his equipment and university work, which is the reason for which he is asking for a loan in order to purchase a computer.

This investment will allow him to carry out assignments in time and work in his classes. This young visionary hopes for a future in which he is a pharmaceutical sales representative and will eventually be able to set up his own pharmacy.

loans.use: To purchase a computer

loans.name: Claudia Juniette

texts.es:
Actualmente la sociedad está más globalizada, razón suficiente para que Claudia decidiera estudiar Mercadotecnia. Esta joven sonriente tiene 22 años de edad y se siente contenta de estudiar lo que tanto desea. Ahora está cursando el tercer año de la licenciatura, gracias al apoyo moral y económicamente por parte de sus padres, principalmente de su papá quien es agricultor.
Claudia está deseosa por seguir aprendiendo sobre el movimiento del mercado global, para ello considera que debe estar a la vanguardia en la tecnología y así desempeñarse mejor en su carrera. Por esta razón solicita un crédito para comprar una computadora, herramienta indispensable para realizar sus trabajos universitarios fácil y eficazmente. En un futuro piensa especializarse en un rama del área mercantil.
texts.en:
These days society is more globalised, reason enough for Claudia to decide to study Marketing. This beaming young woman is 22 years old and is happy to study what she wants so much. She is currently in her third year of her degree, thanks to the moral and economic support of her parents, primarily of her father who is a farmer.

Claudia wishes to continue studying about the movement of the global market, for this she judges that she should be at the forefront with technology and thus perform better in her career. For this reason she is asking for a loan to buy a computer, an indispensable tool to carry out her university work easily and efficiently. In the future she wants to specialise in a branch of the commercial field.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Cherry

texts.en:
Cherry is a 35-year old married woman and mother of three children from San Dionisio, Iloilo. She runs a small sari-sari, or convenience store, selling various goods and items. She has been in the business for more than 10 years. Her husband works as a fisherman.

Cherry needs a loan to buy more stock to sell like rice, canned goods, noodles, soda, other beverages, soap, toiletries, cooking oil, and condiments, among other items. She believes a loan from Kiva will help improve her business and income. She also wants to save money to pay for her children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like rice, canned goods, noodles, soda, other beverages, soap, toiletries, cooking oil, and condiments, among other items

loans.name: Mariya

texts.ru: Мария, 51 год, замужем, дети все взрослые и самостоятельные. Семья очень дружная и уважаемая в селе. Мария много лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. Бизнес она начала в 1986 году, на сегодняшний день она успешный фермер своего небольшого хозяйства, в котором у нее имеется: 3 коровы, 25 овец. Также у Марии в наличии есть земельный надел мерою 1,0 ГА, где она ежегодно выращивает кукурузу и клевер.  Ежемесячная прибыль составляет до 20,000 сом (KGS). Всю прибыль от бизнеса Мария старается вкладывать в развитие бизнеса. Она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом, в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы и полеводство. Мария хочет развить ее бизнес, чтобы в будущем увеличить земельный надел для посева.
texts.en: Mariya is 51 years old and married.  Her children are all adults and independent.  Mariya's family is very friendly and well respected in the village.  Mariya has been involved in animal husbandry and agriculture for many years.  She started her own business in 1986 and she is now a successful farmer, who owns three cows and 25 sheep.  She also has one hector of land on which she grows corn and clover annually.  She makes a monthly income of up to 20,000 som (KGS) and she tries to reinvest all her profits into further expanding her business.  She has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy one cow and to cultivate her land.  She wants to grow her business so that, in the future, she can acquire more land for crop farming.

loans.use: to purchase one cow and to cultivate her land in order to invest in her business.

loans.name: Las Invensibles Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Las Invensibles está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, ellas también forma parte del programa de eliminación, donde ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Carolina quien a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de su venta de mercería se va abriendo camino, y tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia e ir mejorando su situación de vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para su mercería, como ser prendas, calzados, artículos de cocina y otros, con lo cual podrá seguir con sus ventas, luchando por algo mejor.
texts.en:
The group called "Las Invensibles" is in its 2nd cycle on the women's committee program. They are also part of the program to eliminate poverty so that they can improve their living conditions.  

One of the group's members is Carolina who is beginning to make her way through lots of effort, continued work and through selling notions. Through these things she has the means to support her family and continue to improve her quality life.  

She is asking for this loan in order to buy supplies for her notions, such as clothing, shoes and cooking utensils amongst other things. With these items she will be able to carry on selling and fighting for something better.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes and cooking utensils amongst other things.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy rice for resale.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen, 48, is a married woman and a mother of four children. She is from San Dionisio, Iloilo. She makes a living through fishing with her husband. For more than six years, fishing has been their source of income.

Helen is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, plywood, nails, and paints for the repair of the fishing boat. A loan will help Helen and her husband to make their fishing business more profitable and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, plywood, nails, and paints for the repair of the fishing boat.

loans.name: Shirly

texts.en:
Shirly is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Shirly is 48 years old, and has two children who are in school.

Shirly has a fish/dried fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 27,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish and dried fish to sell to her customers.

Shirly has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish and dried fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is 46 years old and married. She has four children. Three of her children are in school.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Geraldine is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Geraldine has been raising pigs for ten years and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Reminita

texts.en:
Reminita is 62 years old and married with four children. Reminita works very hard to provide for them.

Reminita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items like canned goods, detergent soap, coffee, juice, sugar, etc. to sell.

Reminita has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items. 

In the future, Reminita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like canned goods, detergent soap, coffee, juice, sugar, etc. to sell

loans.name: Fredigunda

texts.en:
Fredigunda is 63 years old and married with two children. 

Fredigunda is in the agricultural business, doing pig fattening in the Philippines. She  requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Fredigunda has been in pig fattening for five years now, and has borrowed 25 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Fredigunda would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Perla

texts.en:
Perla works hard to support her family. She is married, and has a raising pigs business in the Philippines. Perla has been in this business for six years now.

Perla requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vaccines and other supplies for her business.

In the future, Perla would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Archil

texts.en:
Archil is 59 years old, and from the village of Melauri, Samtredia district. He lives with his pensioner father, daughter and wife, who gets a 300 GEL fixed salary. She is the only breadwinner in the family, so accordingly, this family finds it hard to cover even basic needs and lives under poverty. 

To improve the family's living condition somehow, Archil decided to be involved in an agribusiness and seek credit among local financial institutions, but his attempts was unsuccessful because of his poor living conditions. The startup program, which is a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, enables the rural poor and inexperienced people to get a loan for starting or re-starting businesses. 

His application was approved under the framework of this program to get a loan of 800 GEL for purchasing chickens and setting up a poultry farm. He will place them in the old building in the yard, and after they grow, he will sell them at the local market for a good price. 

Because of Kiva lenders, Archil will get the chance to generate his own income, do his part for the family's welfare, and live in better conditions. 

He awaits your support and kindness.

loans.use: To set up a poultry farm and start selling chickens

loans.name: Mays

texts.en:
Mays is a 22-year-old single lady, living with her family in Irbid. She is in her fourth year to get a bachelor's degree, majoring in banking and finance in her last year.

Mays`s mother is working as an English teacher, and her father is retired from the army, but his pension is not enough to meet all of the education fees of his children. So Mays requested an education loan to cover her semester fees; that will help her graduate faster and find a job.

She hopes to find a job immediately after she graduates to help her family with household expenses.

loans.use: to pay her university registration fees for the semester.

loans.name: Nermi

texts.en:
Nermi is a 57-year-old married woman from the village of Akho. She has two sons, a daughter-in-law, and a husband, who is a choreographer and gets a fixed salary. Her sons are also employed at the local theater. Their salaries, however, are not enough to meet all daily costs for the family. 

With the help of her family members, Nermi is extensively engaged in an agribusiness. For more than 25 years she has been involved in cattle breeding, in horticulture, and in the cultivation of family-owned agricultural land. They sell the agricultural products in the local market. As it becomes harder to earn a living over time, Nermi wants to expand her agribusiness in order to more effectively meet the daily costs of her family. 

A loan of 6,000 GEL will be a great support to this hard-working woman and her family, enabling her to purchase a special variety of fish and start breeding them. She will grow them and sell at good prices at the local market. 

Nermi and her family rely on the goodwill of the lenders and will highly appreciate their support.

loans.use: To purchase a special variety of fish to breed

loans.name: Clementina

texts.es:
Clementina tiene 49 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa propia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Su población se dedica principalmente a la crianza de animales y el comercio.

Ella tiene su bodega en la cual vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, entre otros, se dedica a este negocio hace 07 años por lo que cuenta con clientes fijos quienes dan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Solicita préstamo para invertir en la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos como arroz, azúcar, fideo, aceite, etc, para incrementar el stock de su negocio, esto le servirá para tener mayor variedad en lo concerniente a productos de primera necesidad con la finalidad de poder satifacer los gustos de sus clientes y asi poder incrementar sus ventas lo que mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Clementina is 49 years old, single, and lives in a home of her own within the rural part of Oyotún, located in the Chiclayo province, within the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.  The residents are mainly merchants and also raise livestock.

She has a store where she sells primary needs products such as rice, sugar, cooking oil, noodles, and other things.  She’s had this business for seven years and comes with good personal and professional references.  She is asking for this loan to buy items in quantity to stock her store, allowing her to have more items on hand to satisfy her customers.  She will be able to increase her sales and improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay her semester fees and buy her books.

loans.name: Joey

texts.en:
Joey works hard to support his family. He is 45 years old, a tricycle driver with 2 children ages 19 and 15.

His wife works abroad as a cook to help him in the education of their children. As a tricycle driver his income of PHP 250 daily is not enough for their daily expenses and the school expenses. 

Joey started an eatery in front of their house and employs his relative as a helper to operate his eatery while he is away and working as a driver. His eatery attracts customers because it’s near the road and most of them are his co-drivers, which gains him a net of PHP 800-1,200 daily. Joey wants to expand his eatery and add more food.

Joey is now requesting a loan amounting to PHP 20,000 to buy 10 kilos of pork, 5 kilos of chicken, vegetables, and seasonings to add more menu to his eatery so he can increase his income.

Joey wants to expand and improve his business to sustain their needs and the continuing education of his children so his wife does not need to go abroad to work and be at home with them.

loans.use: To buy 10 kilos of pork, 5 kilos of chicken, vegetables, and seasonings to add more menu to his eatery

loans.name: Tamar

texts.en:
Tamar is a 38-year-old woman who lives in Batumi city and takes care of her children alone. She has a student son and school-aged daughter. Tamar finds it hard to lead the family, as she has only a fixed salary of 330 GEL per month and works at the local public school as a teacher. She requires another source of income for making normal living conditions for her children. 

Tamar started house renovating and now she needs additional financial support to finish the started activity. After several unsuccessful attempts, Tamar applied for a credit to MFO Credo. Her request was approved in the framework of Start Up program, which is joint initiative with Kiva, permitting poor people to start or re-start businesses. 

Tamar will finish all the work and after renovating, she will rent the house out at a good price to tourists. The city where she lives is the most popular resort in  the country and has many visitors from abroad also. 

The new business will be a great help to this motivated woman and her children, enabling her to give them a good education for progressing in life. She will be very grateful for the financial support.

loans.use: To finish renovating the house and then rent it out

loans.name: Ma. Sulminda

texts.en:
Ma. Sulminda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a rug-making business in the Philippines.

Ma. Sulminda requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more raw materials for her business.

Ma. Sulminda has been in this business for 19 years now.

In the future, Ma. Sulminda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more raw materials for her business

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Evangeline is 35 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Evangeline has a basket-weaving business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 22,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more materials for her weaving business.

Evangeline has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Evangeline would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her weaving business

loans.name: Mzevinar

texts.en:
Mzevinar, who is a 48-year-old married woman, lives in the village of Chanchkhalo. She has a husband, 2 daughters, and a son who works at a private company and gets a fixed salary. 

Mzevinar is a hardworker who greatly helps the family to create financial stability. She is involved in agribusiness, taking care of cattle and selling milk products at the local market. Also she owns a small general store and serves the clients herself.

In order to start a new and significant source of income for the family that will also improve their living conditions, Mzevinar wants to purchase a mini-bus. 

She needs financial support to realize her desire and has requested credit at local financial institutions. She received credit within the framework of a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo that is a Startup Program that gives people the chance to start or re-start businesses. 

Mzevinar's husband will be the driver of this bus and will work on a bus line. He will have regular customers among the local people. This credit will be a great support for the family. 

Mzevinar is thankful to Kiva lenders for giving her a chance to generate additional income for the family's welfare.

loans.use: To purchase a mini-bus and work it on a bus line.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
El socio  Mario pertenece al banco comunal SANTA ROSITA DE LIMA, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Mario continua dedicándose al negocio de venta de ropa, dvds entre otros, el socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, él socio continua vendiendo su mercadería  su clientes que le solicitan, él socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de Dvds  entre otros.
texts.en:
Mario is part of the Santa Rosita de Lima communal bank group. The bank is located in Cusco district, Cusco province, and Cusco department.

Mario continues working selling clothing, DVDs and more. He is grateful for the granted loan and promises to make the established payments. He continues selling his merchandise to his customers who ask him for it. He is a responsible and dedicated person, in this way he gets his family ahead.

He asks for a loan to purchase DVDs and more.

loans.use: to purchase DVDs and more.

loans.name: Ahed

texts.en:
Ahed is 19 years old and lives in Irbid. He is an ambitious man and an example of a nosy person, as he likes to know and understand everything that will help him recognize the requirements for dealing with people as well as knowing the community's requirements. 

He is studying psychological counseling, and he thinks that will help him to get more knowledge about everything. 

Ahed believes that his major will help him to learn the secrets of dealing with people. His family is facing financial difficulties; therefore, he requested an education loan to cover his semester fees.

loans.use: To cover his semester fees.

loans.name: Obada

texts.en:
Obada is a 23-year-old third-year university student studying the Arabic language. He lives in Irbid with his family which consists of nine members including his parents. His father is retired. 

Obada is hardworking and always spends his free time looking for a good job. He would like to request a loan because he does not have enough money to pay his university fees. 

This loan will help him to cover his university fees and graduate successfully. After graduation, Obada hopes to have a proper job and then he will be able to save enough money to help his big family.

loans.use: To cover his university fees and graduate successfully.

loans.name: Shadi

texts.en:
Shadi is a 23-year-old married man from Yatta, a village near Hebron city. He works as a construction worker, earning a low and unstable income. He also has a barn for raising sheep in the village which has been opened for the past three years. He makes dairy products and sells them in the local market. It is a very good business and the income is high.  

Shadi has requested a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more sheep. By taking this loan, his productivity will increase and also his income. Shadi appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more sheep for his dairy business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more sheep for his barn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sheep for his new barn.

loans.name: Señor De Huanca De Cusco Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE HUANCA DE CUSCO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Julia ella es casada y tiene 53 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de comida, la socia es una mujer emprendedora que por medio de este negocio la socia quiere que sus hijos que terminen de estudiar, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant grande. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollo, verduras, arroz y carne.
La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de frazadas, negocio de crianza de animales, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members are part of the "SEÑOR DE HUANCA DE CUSCO” communal bank. This bank is located in Cusco district, part of Cusco province and Cusco department.

Julia is married and is 53 years old and has 4 children. She works in her business selling food. She is an enterprising woman who, through this business, wants her children to finish their education. Her dream is to have a large restaurant.

She asks for a loan to purchase chicken, vegetables, rice, and meat.

The woman who is attached to the group photo got her photo taken after the reunion because she asked permission due to work.

The other members work selling blankets, in a business raising animals, a grocery store business and a business selling food. 

The member is grateful to those who are part of this dream through this platform and promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase chicken, vegetables, rice, and meat.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Adelaida is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Adelaida is 52 years old, and one of her children is still in school.

Adelaida has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional materials such as fishing net, gasoline, fish containers, etc. for her business.

Adelaida has been in this business for five years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials such as fishing net, gasoline, fish containers, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is 31 years old and married with five children. With three children currently in school, Arlene works very hard to provide for them.

Arlene runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks like canned goods, candies, biscuits, coffee, soft-drinks, beers, etc. to sell. Arlene has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, candies, biscuits, coffee, soft-drinks, beers, etc. 

In the future, Arlene would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks like canned goods, candies, biscuits, coffee, soft-drinks, beers, etc. to sell

loans.name: Ofelia Maribel

texts.es:
Ofelia, conserva la venta de bebidas refrescantes, jugos naturales y fruta picada en el mercado con la ayuda de los créditos que padecomsm y kiva le otorgan, no ha tenido dificultades para mantenerse trabajando y su grupo familiar tiene una vida más cómoda.
Requiere un nuevo crédito para comprar gaseosas, jugos, gatorade, agua, pepinos, piñas, mangos, sandias, etc., al mayoreo, de esa forma satisfacera las necesidades de sus clientes y continuar obteniendo los ingresos que necesita para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Ofelia still sells refreshing drinks, natural juices, and chopped fruit in the market with the help of the loans that PADECOMSM and Kiva grant him. She has not had difficulties in keeping working and her family has a more comfortable life. 

She needs a new loan to purchase soft drinks, juice, Gatorade, water, cucumbers, pineapples, mangoes, watermelons, etc., in bulk, in this way she will meet her customers' needs and to continue getting the income she needs to get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, juice, Gatorade, water, cucumbers, pineapples, mangoes, watermelons, etc., in bulk, in this way she will meet her customers' needs.

loans.name: Montessa

texts.en:
Montessa is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Montessa is 42 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Montessa has a general store business in the Philippines. Montessa requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store. Montessa has been in this business for seven years. In the future, Montessa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Nazibrola

texts.en:
Nazibrola is 34-year-old housekeeper who works hard to create financial stability for her family. She has a pensioner mother-in-law, a little son and a husband who is a day-worker and gets an insignificant income. 

To meet the daily costs of her family, Nazibrola got involved in agribusiness. She is engaged with cattle and cow breeding, as well as in the cultivation of agricultural land, where she harvests nuts. 

With the help of her husband, she sells the products at the local market. However, her income is seasonal and she has a great desire to be involved in another business, along with this activity. 

She couldn’t receive a loan from the local financial institutions because of their requirement to have a stable income. Then the Start Up program began, which is a joint product of Kiva and Credo. The program allows rural poor like Nazibrola to get a chance to start or re-start a business. 

With the received credit, she will purchase a juice machine and sell juice in front of a local public school. Her customers will be schoolchildren.

It is obvious that the job will be hard for Nazibrola, but she is ready to deal with the difficulties and develop her business gradually. The Start Up credit will be a great support for the family, as they will have daily income, thanks to the Kiva Lenders.

loans.use: To purchase a juice machine and provide her service near the public school.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To cover his semester fees.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 23-year-old single man from Dier El Balah city.  He has a barn for raising sheep next to his house. It is a good business but still needs some improvements. 
Ibrahim took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more sheep for his barn.  By taking this loan, the productivity will increase and also the income.
Ibrahim appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy more sheep for his barn

loans.name: Nawal

texts.en:
Nawal is a 40 year-old married woman from Yatta, a village near Hebron city.  She is a mother of five sons and four daughters.  Her husband works as a construction worker where he gets a low and unstable income. This income barely covers all the family needs. Nawal has a barn for raising sheep. She started this business three years ago. 
Nawal took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy new sheep and some feed for the barn.  By taking this loan, Nawal will be able to increase the productivity and also the income. 
Nawal appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy new sheep and some feed for the barn

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 29-year-old married man from Gaza city.  He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income.   This income barely cover all the family needs. Ahmad and his wife would like to improve the home and buy all the needed stuff.

Ahmad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water.   By taking this loan, Ahmad will be able to reduce the electricity usage. 
Ahmad appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water

loans.name: Santusa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE LIMA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Santusa continua con su negocio de venta de ropa, la socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia continua vendiendo casacas, chompas entre otros, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder  seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar casacas.
texts.en:
Santusa is a member of the SANTA ROSITA DE LIMA communal bank, located in Cusco district, province and department.

Santusa continues to sell clothing such as jackets and sweaters. She is grateful for the loan and and promises to repay it on time. Santusa is a responsible and hardworking person who wishes to continue working so that she can help her family in this way.

She will use the loan to buy jackets.

loans.use: buy jackets

loans.name: Bruno

texts.es:
El socio Bruno pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE LIMA”;  el socio continua dedicándose  al negocio de venta de ropa, el socio se siente agradecido  por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para comprar chompas entre otros.
texts.en:
The member Bruno belongs to the “Santa Rosita De Lima” communal bank. He continues dedicating himself to his business selling clothing. He feels thankful for the loan and promises to comply with the repayment schedule. He is a responsible and diligent person, feeling that this is the way he takes his family forward.

He requests the loan to buy sweaters, among other things.

loans.use: to buy sweaters, among other things.

loans.name: Desiree

texts.en:
Desiree is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Desiree is 38 years old and has five children who are currently in school.

Desiree has a fishing business in the Philippines. Desiree requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional fishing nets for her business.

Desiree has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Desiree would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net for her business

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline works hard to support her family. Evangeline is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.  She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Evangeline has been in this business for five years now.  She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en:
Jesusa works hard to support her family.  She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. Jesusa requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store.

Jesusa has been in this business for 10 years now.  She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Monina

texts.en:
Monina is 51 years old and married.  She has two children. With one child still in school, Monina works very hard to provide for them.

Monina runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store.  She has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as rice, cereals, milk, diapers, toothpaste, sanitary pads, etc. 

Monina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Myla

texts.en:
Myla is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Myla is 35 years old and has two children who are in school.

Myla has a direct selling Sundance products business in the Philippines. Myla requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more products from Sundance to sell to her customers.

Myla has been in this business for five years. In the future, Myla would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more products from Sundance to sell to her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for advertising, and staffing for clothes printing.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
Juan, vive con su compañera de vida y dos hijos, se dedica a trabajar en el cultivo de granos básicos y en la crianza de ganado, desempeña dichas actividades con el propósito de obtener alimento y generar ingresos para cubrir gastos familiares, tiene ochos años de tener su negocio.
Invertirá en insumos agrícolas y alimento para el ganado, se mantendrá trabajando en la agricultura y subsistiendo con su familia, espera aumentar la productividad de sus cosechas y cuidar mejor a su ganado.
Sus objetivos son pagar sus deudas, seguir trabajando y ofrecerles un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Juan lives with this wife and two children. He is dedicated to work growing basic grains and raising livestock. He performs these activities with the goal of obtaining food and generating income to cover his family’s expenses. He has had his business for eight years.

He will invest in agricultural supplies and feed for the livestock. He will continue working in agriculture and surviving with his family. He hopes to increase the productivity of his harvests and to take better care of his livestock.

His goals are to pay his debts, continue working, and offer a better future to his children.

loans.use: to invest in agricultural supplies and feed for livestock. He will continue working in agriculture.

loans.name: Lesby

texts.es: Lesby de 54 años de edad tiene 7 años de experiencia de negocios, los cuales surgieron cuando en el año 2008 , su esposos pensionado de la policia, conociendola como una mujer activa,  le dió un capital semilla para que generara ingresos. Lesby inicióvendiedno pequeños articulos entre sus amigas, que fueron su mercado inicial y posteriormente ahorrando y una vez mas con recursos económicos que le suministró su esposo, compraron un vehiculo para ofrecer el servicio público de táxi. Hoy todos los dias recibe ingresos por estos dos conceptos y no tiene horarios, porque se adapta a los requerimientos de su clientela. Su meta mas inmediata es lograr atraer nuevos clientes, maas adelante tener su propia vivienda y continuar educando con calidad a sus hijos, que se encuentran en las edades de 16, 22 y 24 años. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará vestuario, calzado y hará mantenieminto al taxi que en la actualidad conduce su esposo y es otra de sus fuentes de ingreso famliar.
texts.en:
Lseby is 54 years old, and she has 7 years of experience in businesses. Her businesses started when, in 2008, her husband—a pensioner from the police—knowing her as an active woman, gave her seed money so that she could generate an income. Lesby started selling small items to her friends. This was her initial business, and later she saved and once again relied on financial resources provided by her husband. They bought a vehicle to offer a taxi service to the public. Now, she receives income everyday from these two businesses. She doesn’t have a set schedule because she adapts to the needs of her clients. 

Her immediate goal is to succeed in attracting her clients. Further in the future, she wants to have her own home and to continue providing a high-quality education to her children, who are 16, 22, and 24 years old. 

At present, she is applying for a Kiva loan, through which she will buy a wardrobe and footwear and will perform maintenance on her taxi, which her husband currently drives. It is another source of the family’s income.

loans.use: to buy a wardrobe and footwear and to perform maintenance on her taxi.

loans.name: Norilyn

texts.en:
Norilyn is 31 years old and married.  She has two children who are currently in school.  Norilyn works very hard to provide for them.  She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries like shampoo, detergent soap, coffee, diapers, bread, eggs, soft-drinks, etc. to sell.

Norilyn has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, detergent soap, coffee, diapers, bread, eggs, soft-drinks, etc. 

In the future, Norilyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries like shampoo, detergent soap, coffee, diapers, bread, eggs, soft-drinks, etc. to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water.

loans.name: Ibrahem

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 37-years-old married man from Rafah city.  He is a father of three sons and two daughters. He works as a teacher in a public school where he gets a low income.  This income barely covers all the family needs. Ibrahim would like to improve the home and buy all the needed stuff.

Ibrahim  took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a water purification machine for the family house.  By taking this loan, Ibrahim will be able to provide clean water for his kids. 
Ibrahim appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a water purification machine for the family house.

loans.name: Yazed

texts.en:
Yazed is a 21-year-old single man from a village near Nablus city. He lives with his family in a small house. His sister works as an employee where she gets a low income. This is the only source of income to the family. Yazed is a student in the university where he studies engineering. 

Yazed took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his study.   This will help him to do his home work and reports easily. 
Yazed appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his study.

loans.name: Feryal

texts.en:
Feryal is a 32-year-old married woman from a village near Jenin city. She is a mother of one son and three daughters. Her husband works as an employee in a local company. Feryal has a small farm where she plants seasonal fruits and vegetables.

Feryal took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy seeds and seedlings for the farm. This will increase the productivity and also the income.
Feryal appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy seeds and seedlings for the farm

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 32-year-old married man from Rafah city.  He is a father of one small son. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income . This income barely covers all the family needs. Ahmad would like to improve the home and buy all the needed stuff.

Ahmad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a water purification machine for the family house. By taking this loan, Ahmad will be able to provide clean water for his family. 
Ahmad appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a water purification machine for the family house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a water purification machine for the family house

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Analyn is 34 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Analyn has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional raw materials for her weaving business.

Analyn has been in this business for eight years. In the future, Analyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional raw materials for her weaving business

loans.name: Jose Balmore

texts.es:
José, comenta que con cada préstamo que se le otorga tiene la oportunidad de mantenerse desarrollando actividades agrícolas y obteniendo los ingresos necesarios para que su familia tenga mejor alimentación y poder disminuir sus deudas.
Se ha decidido a solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar dos vaquillas de manera inmediata para aumentar su inventario, espera tener resultados positivos de la inversión, así como en el crédito anterior.
texts.en:
With each loan that he obtains José uses the opportunity to develop his farm and earn the income necessary to provide his family with better food and to pay off his debts.

He has decided to seek another loan to buy two heifers immediately and increase his herd. He expects to obtain positive results from this investment as he did with the previous loan.

loans.use: buy two heifers and increase the size of his herd

loans.name: Emerlinda

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Emerlinda works hard to support her family.

She has a basket weaving business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Emerlinda is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to purchase additional materials for her basket weaving business.

Emerlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for her business

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena is 33 years old, is married, and has one child, who is in school. Lorena is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Lorena has been in pig fattening for three years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase different kinds of foods and items to his a small grocery

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay her university fees and achieve her dreams.

loans.name: Asefah

texts.en:
Asefah is 47 years old lives in Rsaifeh. She is a very adorable woman, and she is married with three children. One of her children is Israa, who is a university student majoring in tourist management. She asked her daughter, Israa, to take her place in the photo because she is a conservative woman. 

Asefah is dreaming of the day she will see her daughter graduated from the university and start on her pathway to her career.

Her husband is retired because he suffered an injury that led him to lose his leg. Therefore they faced financial problems and could not pay their daughter's fees.

Because of that Asefah applied for an education loan to pay her daughter`s university fees and buy what books she needs.

loans.use: To pay her daughter's university fees and buy the books she needs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay her daughter's university fees.

loans.name: Ade

texts.en:
Adi is a 20-year-old married man from Yatta, a village near Hebron city. For the past three years. he has had a barn in the village for raising sheep. 

It is a very good business and the income is high. He makes dairy products and sells them in the local market. 

Adi took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more sheep for his barn. By taking this loan, the productivity will increase and also the income. 

Adi appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy more sheep for his barn.

loans.name: Gerarda

texts.en:
Gerarda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a charcoal vending business in the Philippines.

Gerarda requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.  She has been in this business for five years now.

Gerarda would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Elsa has requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, fish, vegetables, and spices for her food production business. 

She has been in this business for three years now. In the future, Elsa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, fish, vegetables, and spices for her food production business

loans.name: Luciana

texts.en:
Luciana is 58 years old and married with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Luciana has a business selling ready-to-wear clothes in the Philippines. She has requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of clothes to sell to her customers.

Luciana has been in this business for six years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of ready-to-wear clothes to sell to her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university fees for her daughter.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
José, no cuenta con el capital necesario para invertir en el negocio de elaboración de calzado, por dicha razón requiere de un nuevo crédito para comprar suelas, pegamento, cuero, tela, etc., le facilitará mantener la continuidad de su negocio y suplir las demandas de sus clientes.
Con el capital anterior pudo fortalecer el negocio y obtener los ingresos de subsistencia familiar, además ha invertido parte de las ganancias en hacer mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
José does not have enough resources to invest in the shoe making business, for this reason he needs a new loan to buy sole, glue, leather, fabric, etc. This will help him continue with his business and to meet the demands of his clients.

With the previous loan he was able to strengthen the business and obtain revenue to sustain his family. In addition, he invested part of the revenue to make some repairs to his home.

loans.use: to buy sole, glue, leather, fabric, etc. to help him continue with his business and meet the demands of his clients.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 44 years old and married, with two children. With one child currently in school, Marilyn works very hard to provide for them.

Marilyn runs a general store in the Philippines and she has requested a PHP 29,500 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy additional items to sell, like canned goods, snack foods, detergent soap, shampoo, coffee, and sugar.

Marilyn has been in this business for four years and she sells a variety of items, such as canned goods, snack foods, detergent soap, shampoo, coffee, and sugar. 

Marilyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell, like canned goods, snack foods, detergent soap, shampoo, coffee, and sugar.

loans.name: Marita

texts.en:
Marita is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She is 51 years old and has three children who are still in school.

Marita has a buy-and-sell rice grains business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to pay for rice grains and the laborers' salaries of her rice mill.

Marita has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to pay for rice grains and the laborers' salaries of her rice mill.

loans.name: Gerlie

texts.en:
Gerlie works hard to support her family. She is married and has a repair shop business in the Philippines.

Gerlie requested a PHP 15,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy additional materials and tools for her business.

Gerlie has been in this business for ten years now. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials and tools for her business.

loans.name: Joselita

texts.en:
Joselita is 46 years old and married, with four children. 

Joselita is in the agricultural business, pig-fattening in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Joselita has been in pig-fattening for 20 years now and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business. She would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in the purchase of creams.

loans.name: Alba Isabel

texts.es:
Alba, es propietaria de una tienda de productos básicos, la cual está ubicada en su vivienda, vive junto a su familia y su madre, ella es casada, abrió su negocio con la finalidad de ser un soporte económico para salir adelante con su familia, lo atiende con ayuda de su mamá de ocho de la mañana a seis de la tarde.
Desea surtir mejor la tienda, por lo que está solicitando un  crédito para comprar dulces, detergentes, jabón, sal, azúcar, pan, huevos, etc., de esa manera responderá a las demandas de sus clientes, pretende incrementar las ventas y ganancias para cancelar su deuda con buena calificación en el uso de créditos.
Sueña con aumentar la competitividad de su negocio y tener recursos económicos disponibles para dar a su familia mejora alimentación, vestuario, educación y salud.
texts.en:
Alba is the proprietress of a general store, which is located in her home.  She lives with her family and her mother, and she is married. 

She opened her store with the objective of providing economic support so her family could get ahead, and she runs it with her mother’s help from eight in the morning until six in the evening.
