In order to continue her work Maria is requesting a new loan to buy yucca, flour, seasonings, pork, corn, oil, etc. to make pupusas and snacks.

loans.use: To buy yucca, flour, seasonings, pork, corn, oil, etc. to make pupusas (stuffed tortillas) and snacks.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy spaghetti for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a cow.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy wax pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing) for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy food ingredients for resale.

loans.name: Claudia Mercedes

texts.es:
Claudia de 42 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos menores de edad, de 15 y 3 años, es originaria de Jinotepe, esta joven mujer se caracteriza por ser trabajadora, responsable, con ganas de superación personal. En sus ratos libre le gusta disfrutar de la compañía de sus hijos. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera y se vio obligada a trabajar desde temprana edad. En la actualidad lucha para sacar adelante a sus hijos.
Gracias a sus ganas de salir adelante  Claudia tiene por actividad económica una pulpería es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, pan, huevos, detergente, aceite, frijoles, etc. Ella dedica unas doce horas diarias ofreciendo sus productos. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra  y venta de productos  comestibles, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos.  Claudia agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Claudia is 42 years old. She is married and has two minor children, aged 15 and 3 years old. She is from Jinotepe. This young woman is characterized as hardworking, responsible, and eager to get ahead. In her free time, she likes to enjoy her children's company. Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources she wasn't able to go to college and she had to work from an early age. Right now she is fighting to get her children ahead. 

Thanks to her drive to get ahead, Claudia's economic activity is a small store where she sells food products such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, detergent, oil, etc. She spends twelve hours a day selling her products. The purpose of the loan is to invest in working capital and stock her food selling business so that in the not so distant future she can obtain better income. Claudia is grateful for the help that Kiva investors offer people of low income and poor countries such as Nicaragua so that they can have worthy work.

loans.use: to stock her store with products such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, detergent, oil, etc.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es: Luz María, tiene 30 años de edad, es casada, tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de Morazan, Yoro.  Ella tiene su propio negocio de venta de helados como conos, ice crean, paletas, copitas, y golosinas como confites y chicles de toda clase, churros, galletas etc. el negocio lo tiene establecido desde hace 6 años en un local que alquila en el centro de la comunidad y lo ha mantenido estable mediante la inversión de varios prestamos. Está solicitando actualmente otro préstamo por 15,000 Lempiras, con el cual comprará más producto para la venta como ser conos, paletas, dulces, galletas etc. Quiere mantener surtido el negocio para poder incrementar las ventas y sus ingresos. Su plan es continuar con el negocio, mantenerlo surtido para obtener ingresos y ayudar a sus hijos con el crecimiento y la educación.
texts.en:
Luz María is 30 years old, married and has two children. She lives in the municipality of Morazon, Yoro. She has her own business selling different kinds of ice cream such as cornets, popsicles etc. She also sells candy and all types of gum, doughnuts, and cookies. She's run the business for six years now from a stall she rents in the centre of the community which she has kept going thanks to the investment of several loans. 

Luz María is now seeking another loan of 15,000 lempiras to buy more products to sell such as cones, popsicles, candy, cookies etc. She wishes to keep her stall well-stocked to increase sales and earn more money. Her plan is to continue with the business, keep it well-stocked, and help her children grow and get an education.

loans.use: To buy cones, popsicles, ice cream, candy, cookies, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Mario Astul

texts.es:
Mario, de 21 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañado y tiene un niño de 8 meses de nacido.

Mario, se dedico a la agricultura y la ganadería desde que tenia 18 años de edad, en compañía de sus padres, pero cuando aprendió el trabajo, decidió hacerlo por si solo.

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar insumos agricolas, para sembrar 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz.

El sueño de Mario, es tener buenas ganancias, para que en un futuro pueda sembrar 28,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y así asegurar un mejor futuro para su familia.
texts.en:
Mario, 21, has a high school education.  He and his partner have an eight-month-old baby.

Mario has worked in agriculture and livestock farming since the age of 18 alongside his parents.  Once he learned the trade he decided to work independently.

The loan he is requesting is to buy farm supplies to plant 14,000 square meters of corn.  Mario's dream is to earn a good profit so he can plant 28,000 square meters of corn in the future and insure a better future for his family.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies to plant 14,000 square meters of corn.

loans.name: Jorge Alexander

texts.es:
Jorge, es joven que se encuentra acompañado, vive con su pareja, aún no tienen hijos, no cuenta con ayuda económica de su familia, en su localidad es reconocido por desarrollar como actividad económica principal la crianza de ganado y cerdos, es un negocio que requiere mucho tiempo y dedicación para obtener los mejores resultados, lo heredó de sus padres hace más de 7 años, lo realiza a tiempo completo con la ayuda de su compañera de vida, su ventaja es que es totalmente independiente y cuenta con experiencia para desarrollarlo.
 Como se está en la temporada seca requiere de un financiamiento con el que se limitara en comprar zacate seco molido para mantener bien alimentado el ganado, con lo cual podrá comercializarlo a un mejor precio, espera saber administrar el crédito, las desventajas son la competencia, enfermedades que puedan afectar a los animales y los altos costos de la alimentación en la época seca.
Sus sueños son  seguir trabajando para tener un negocio más rentable, con el cual pueda cambiar su estilo de vida familiar y tener un patrimonio que ofrecer a sus futuros hijos.
texts.en:
Jorge is a young man who is married. He lives with his spouse and they still have no children. He does not have any financial help from his family. He is known in his family for raising cattle and pigs as a main economic activity. This is a business that requires a lot of time and dedication to obtain the best results. He inherited it from his parents more than 7 years ago. He does it full time with help from his life's companion. The advantage is that he is totally independent and has the experience to do it.  

Since it is the dry season, he needs a loan with which he will just by ground dry grass to keep his cattle well fed. With it, he will be able to sell at a better price. He expects to manage the loan well. The disadvantages are the competition, diseases that can affect the animals and the high costs of feed in the dry season. 

His dream is to keep working to have a more profitable business with which he can change his family lifestyle and have assets to offer his future children.

loans.use: to buy ground dried grass to keep his cattle well fed.

loans.name: Efrain

texts.es:
El trabajo del campo es una de las labores más difíciles hoy en día por el gran esfuerzo que se debe hacer para progresar, pero Efraín es un hombre que nunca se ha rendido a pesar del clima o las circunstancias que puedan pasar, el siempre está dispuesto a conseguir los recursos para su familia.

Se levanta desde primera hora de la mañana para desplazarse a distintas fincas para cumplir con sus obligaciones laborales. 

Este oficio lo alterna con la venta de leche que obtiene de sus propias vacas.

 El desea aumentar su capital de trabajo para garantizar el sostenimiento de sus negocios y es esta la razón que la lleva a solicitar un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de dos vaca lecheras que le de un buen impulso a su negocio.

Apoya a Efraín con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Farm work is one of the most difficult jobs today due to the huge effort needed to progress. But Efraín is a man who have never given up despite the weather or the circumstances that can occur. He is always willing to get the resources for his family. 

He gets up very early in the morning to go to different farms to perform his work duties. He alternates this activity with selling milk that he obtains from his own cows. 

He wants to increase his working capital to guarantee the sustainability of his businesses and that is the reason that he is asking for a loan to invest in buying two dairy cows that will give his business a good boost. 

Support Efraín with a loan.

loans.use: to buy dairy cows to give his business a boost.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs and chickens and feed for guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Jose Daniel

texts.es:
José, de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, tiene aproximadamente 10 años de vivir en el mismo domicilio, está soltero, no tiene hijos y en su casa solo vive con la mamá y un hermano.

José, se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol, además es empleado en una panadería, el negocio donde el trabaja queda cerca de su casa, al igual que el terreno donde siembra; en la siembra de granos básicos se involucra su hermano, por la mañana trabaja en la panadería y por las tardes va a cuidar sus cultivos.

José, utilizara el dinero para pagar el alquiler de la tierra en donde sembrará y para comprar insumos agrícolas para los cultivos.

José, siempre a soñado tener el dinero suficiente para reparar el techo de la casa donde vive, para no que no se le mojen las pertenencias, ya que se encuentra un poco deteriorado.
texts.en:
José, 28 years old, went to school up to the ninth grade. He has been living in the same house for approximately 10 years, is single, doesn't have any children, and in the house he only lives with his mother and a brother.

José works growing corn and beans, and is also an employee at a bakery. The business where he works is near his house, as is the land where he plants. His brother is involved in planting the basic crops. He works in the bakery in the morning and in the afternoons he goes to take care of his crops. 

José will use the money to pay for the land rental where he will plant and to purchase agricultural supplies for his crops.

José has always dreamed of having enough money to repair the roof of the house where he lives, so that their belongings don't get wet, since it is a bit deteriorated.

loans.use: to pay for land rental where he will plant and to purchase agricultural supplies for his crops.

loans.name: Lauro

texts.es:
El socio Lauro se dedica la negocio de agricultura,el socio tiene un terreno donde siembra cafe y cacao,el socio es una persona trabajadora y por medio de este negocio el socio quiere sacar adelante a su familia .El socio solicita el credito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member, Lauro, works in the business of agriculture. He has a plot of land where he grows coffee and cocoa. He is a very hard-working person and through his business he has been able to get his family ahead. He asks for the loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

He is grateful for the loan and promises to make his payments.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Alfredo Isaac

texts.es:
El socio Alfredo Isacc  pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE LIMA”, él socio se dedica  al negocio de elaboración y venta de muebles de madera y metal, él socio lleva años   dedicándose  a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, él sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de venta de muebles.
El socio solicita el crédito para comprar materiales como madera.
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Alfredo Isaac belongs to the "Santa Rosita de Lima" communal bank. He works in the business of making and selling furniture made from wood and metal. He has worked in this business for years, which is going well for him, thanks to the determination he puts into his business each day. His dream is to expand his business selling furniture.

He is asking for the loan to purchase materials such as wood.

He is happy for the loan and promises to make the payments on the loan.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as wood.

loans.name: Gladys Jasmina

texts.es:
Honesta, trabajadora, entusiasta y perseverante, son algunas de las cualidades que Jasmina confiesa tener. Las cuales le han servido para poder desarrollarse como persona y como profesional. En la actualidad, cursa su último año en Administración de empresas, y las ansias por graduarse se hacen cada vez más a flor de piel. 
Entre las ventajas que le traerá a su vida su profesión, está: el lograr una mayor estabilidad económica en su hogar, podrá prosperar al lado de su esposo y ayudar a su familia. Por ello, solicita un crédito para pagar, los módulos de culminación de estudio.
texts.en:
Honest, hard-working, enthusiastic, and persevering are some of the qualities that Jasmina says she has. These have served her to be able to develop herself as a person and as a professional. Currently, she is in her last year of a business administration program and her eagerness to graduate is more and more evident. 

Among the advantages that her professional life will bring her is achieving a better economic stability for her household, she will be able to prosper at the side of her husband and help her family. For this, she asks for a loan to pay for the culminating classes for her education.

loans.use: to pay for the culminating classes for her education.

loans.name: Efrain Juanito

texts.es:
Efrain tiene 31 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos en el distrito de San Felipe que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La poblacion se dedica a la agricultura siendo el cultivo de lima el de mayor producción, así como al comercio.

El se dedica al cultivo y comercio de limas, cuenta con más de 05 años de experiencia en el rubro y con clientes fijos quienes dan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El crédito será utilizado para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para su cultivo de lima, con esto Efrain espera ofrecer un producto de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Efrain is 31 years old, in a common-law marriage, and lives with his wife and their two children in San Felipe district, which is located in Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the  northern mountains of Peru. The population works in agriculture, with lemon cultivation having the highest production, and also in trade. 

He works growing and selling lemons, he has more than 5 years of experience in the field and has regular customers who give him very good personal and work references. The loan will be used to purchase manure and fertilizers for the cultivation of lemons. With this, Efrain hopes to offer a better quality product to his customers, which will generate more income and will improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizer for his lemon crop.

loans.name: Geovanny Alexander

texts.es: Alexander es un joven  trabajador  que sus ingresos los obtiene  de su negocio de crianza de animales,  del jornal de actividades de agricultura y a veces se dedica a pintar casas. Alexander  tiene 23 años y  vive con su madre y comenta que no  creció con su padre y que nunca le apoyo el en nada, Alexandre necesita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de chanchos y de este  espera seguir adelante para trabajar y apoyar en lo pueda a su  madre.
texts.en: Alexander is a hard-working young man who gets his income from his business raising animals, from day labor in agriculture, and sometimes he works painting houses. Alexander is 23 years old and lives with his mother. He says he didn't grow up with his father and that he never supported him at all. Alexander needs the money from the loan to invest it in the purchase of pigs and he hopes to continue onward to work and to support his mother as much as he can.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Cecilia Nathaly

texts.es: Cecilia es una joven de 20 años de edad, Cecilia vive con sus padres que han crecido en el campo donde  se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y crianza de animales menores, Cecilia se dedica  a la crianza de animales y a trabajar al jornal, Cecilia necesita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de chanchos, Cecilia espera poder  criar mas de estos animales y de sus ingresos prepararse para tener un buen futuro.
texts.en: Cecilia is a 20-year-old young woman. Cecilia lives with her parents who grew up in the countryside where they work in agriculture, animal husbandry, and raising small animals. Cecilia works raising animals and as a day laborer. Cecilia needs the loan to invest it in the purchase of pigs. Cecilia hopes to be able to raise more of these animals and have more income to prepare herself to have a better future.

loans.use: to purchase pigs

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa, 39, is a married woman with five children, two of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Elsa has a buy and sell rice grains business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years.

Elsa requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice grains to sell.

In the future, Elsa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice grains to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Emma

texts.en:
Ma. Emma is a 58-year-old married woman with five children. Two of her children are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Ma. Emma has a fishing business in the Philippines.She has been in this business for ten years. 

Ma. Emma requested a PHP 29,500 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy fishnet and other equipment.

In the future, Ma. Emma would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishnet and other equipment.

loans.name: Oeng

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in the Chol Kiri district of Kampong Chnnag province, Oeng is age 36 years and married. She has five dependent children. 

To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice for several years. The current business earns them about 13,000 KHR per day. 

This is the second micro loan for Oeng with VisionFund. Now she is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers for her farmland and household supplies for using in her family. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Chnang Province, Chol Kiri District

loans.name: Irene

texts.es:
La socia Irene se sigue dedicando al negocio de agricultura, la socia tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra café y plátanos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de agricultura. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Irene continues to work in agriculture. She has cultivated a plot of land where she grows coffee and plantains. She works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. She has been in this business for some years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to expand her agricultural business. She asks for the loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Cesar Carlos

texts.es:
Cesar tiene 26 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y su menor hijo en la parte rural del distrito de Pomahuaca, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú, contando con servicios de agua y luz. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

La actividad que realiza Cesar es brindar servicios como transportista cuenta con una unidad propia. Tiene 2 años de experiencia en esta actividad, además se dedica realizar trabajos como peón agrícola, ingresos adicionales que le permiten solventar el crédito con total normalidad.

El destino del crédito será para invertir en arreglos a su movilidad, asegurando de esta forma el correcto funcionamiento de su herramienta de trabajo, lo que en un corto plazo le generará mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Cesar is 26 years old, in a common law marriage, and lives with his spouse and young child in a rural area of the Pomahuaca district, located in the Jaén province, in the region of Cajamarca in the northern highlands of Peru. He has water and electricity service. His community works mostly in agriculture, livestock, and commerce.

Cesar works providing transportation services with his own vehicle. He has two years of experience doing this work. He also works as a farmhand and the additional income will allow him to repay the loan in the expected way.

He will use the loan to invest in repairs to ensure that it is functioning properly as he uses it for work, which in a short time will generate higher income and so improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in repairs to his vehicle to ensure that it is functioning properly as he uses it for work

loans.name: Jenifer

texts.en:
Jenifer is single and has a meat and fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years now.

Jenifer requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional meat and fish to sell to her customers.

In the future, Jenifer would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional meat and fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.en:
Sandra is 37 years old, married, and has two children who are both in school.

Sandra is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She has been in pig fattening for three years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Sandra requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

In the future, Sandra would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: José Gilberto

texts.es:
José, de 67 años de edad, no fue a la escuela, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, solo tienen una hija que vive con ellos, la cual hace también oficios domésticos.

José, tiene más de 40 años de dedicarse a la agricultura y a la ganadería, la parcela donde siembra y donde pasta el ganado, está cerca de la casa; su esposa le ayuda a la recolección de cosecha.

José, utilizara el dinero para comprar una vaca.

Los sueños de José, son tener un hato de ganado muy grande, para tener mayor producción de leche, para venderla y obtener mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
José, 67 years old, never went to school. He is married and his wife takes care of the household tasks. They only have one daughter who lives with them, who also works on the household chores.

José has worked in agriculture and animal husbandry for more than 40 years. The plot that he plants and where he pastures his livestock is near his house. His wife helps him with collecting the harvest.

José will use the money to buy a cow.

José's dream is to have a very large cattle herd, to have more milk production to sell it and get more income.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Devora De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Más de dos décadas tiene la señora Devora de los Ángeles, de ofrecer sus productos perecederos, en el mercado. Trabajo que le ha ayudado a sacar a delante a sus dos hijas, pues es la principal fuente de ingresos de su casa. Ésta mujer trabajadora y honesta, es un ejemplo de fortaleza y de lucha  poder sobrevivir, aun cuando las condiciones económicas son mínimas. 
Por ello, solicita un crédito para la compra de tomates, papas, plátanos, repollo, limón, chayote, etc. El cual le será de ayuda para no bajar sus ventas, porque en la actualidad cuenta con una amplia clientela, que prefieren los productos de doña Devora por lo frescos y cálidos que son.
texts.en:
For more than two decades, Devora de los Ángeles has been selling her perishable products in the market. The work has helped her to get her two daughters ahead, since it is the primary source of income in her house. She is a hard-working and honest woman, an example of strength and the fight to survive, even when the economic conditions are minimal.

For this, she asks for a loan to purchase tomatoes, potatoes, plantains, cabbage, lemons, chayote, etc. which will be a help so her sales don't go down because currently she has a broad customer base who prefer Devora's products for their freshness and warmth.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes, potatoes, plantains, cabbage, lemons, chayote, etc.

loans.name: Erwin

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Erwin lives in Sukabumi, a city located at the foot of Mount Gede in West Java, about 80 km from the national capital of Indonesia, Jakarta. He is happily married. Together with his wife, they have a very cute daughter. 

Erwin owns a stall that sells daily consumer products and provides mobile payment services for his community. He decided to join Ruma because he wants to try to expand his business using technology. Erwin is a hardworking person and his community sees him as a trusted mobile provider. 

As the business grows, Erwin is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits and bill payment services to his community. Your loan will be very useful to help Erwin improve his business and his community, which needs access to such services. Erwin’s goal in the near future is to provide an e-commerce business for his customers,

In the photo, Erwin is sitting in front of his stall. He thanks you for your kind support.

loans.use: to sell mobile airtime credits and provide bill payment services.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is 45 years old, married, and has three children. With two children currently in school, Alicia works very hard to provide for them.

Alicia runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as eggs, vinegar, canned goods, coffee, sugar, etc.

Alicia requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like eggs, vinegar, canned goods, coffee, sugar, etc. to sell.

In the future, Alicia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items like eggs, vinegar, canned goods, coffee, sugar, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen is a responsible mother of five children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. 

Her husband has been providing transport facilities by driving a taxi for six years. Her husband is responsible to fulfill the needs of the entire family. Her husband needs to do maintenance of his taxi because the current condition of his taxi is not good and it requires more maintenance charges daily. Due to insufficient financial means, her husband is unable to do maintenance of his taxi. Therefore, Nasreen has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan Nasreen's husband can afford the maintenance cost easily and provide better transport facilities to earn a profitable income. 

Nasreen plans to also save some of the profit of her husband's income to meet her family's needs in future.

Nasreen is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her husband repair his taxi.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Elizabeth requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

She has been in this business for eight years now.

Elizabeth would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Erma

texts.en:
Erma is 32 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Erma is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Erma has been in pig fattening for 10 years, and also earns additional income from basket weaving.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Chona

texts.en:
Chona is 40 years old and a married woman with five children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Chona has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more seafood to sell.

Chona has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more seafood

loans.name: Isidra

texts.en:
Isidra is 50 years old and married with two children.

Isidra is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional piglets, feed, and other supplies for her business.

Isidra has been in pig fattening for six years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets, feed, and other supplies

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.en:
Beatriz is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a basket weaving business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to buy additional raw materials for her basket weaving business.

Beatriz has been in this business for 10 years. She earns more income from pig fattening.

Beatriz has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional raw materials for her weaving business

loans.name: Jennelyn

texts.en:
Jennelyn is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Jennelyn is 33 years old, and has one child who is currently in school.

Jennelyn has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase ingredients like meat, fish, noodles, spices, etc. for her business.

Jennelyn has been in this business for three years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, fish, noodles, spices, etc.

loans.name: Sok

texts.en:
Sok is 32 years old and married. She is a mother of two children. 

To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice for three years and they supplement their family’s income by raising pigs.  The current business earns her about 13,000 KHR per day.  

Sok has been with VisionFund for three cycles and now she is asking for a loan to buy piglets for raising. She hopes to fatten her pigs so as to sell them for a good price.

loans.use: to buy piglets for raising.

location.town: Siem Reap province, Chi Kreng district

loans.name: Bernaliza

texts.en:
Bernaliza is a hardworking mother from Talibon, Bohol. She is a 28-year-old married woman with four young dependents. Her oldest is 6 and the youngest is 2 months old.  She earns a living by means of fishing. She catches fish, crabs and seashells. She has been engaged in fishing for more than 10 years. 

She is asking for a loan to buy a motorboat engine and crab trap. These will help her ongoing catch improve its quantity and could create more fish, crabs and seashells to be sold in the market. She could now afford to buy nutritious diets for the whole family, mange her finances and settle her obligations.

She hopes that her business will become productive and successful for the welfare of her growing children.

loans.use: to buy a motorboat engine and crab trap

loans.name: Mely

texts.en: Mely is 50 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has four children who are adults or in school. Mely earns a living from a snack-vending business. She has made fish balls, squid rolls, tempura, banana cue, juices, and salted peanuts for the last 20 years. She earns approximately 4,000 PHP each month doing this type of business activity. She has requested a loan to purchase bananas, sticks, and ingredients for making snacks and juice, such as sugar and milk. Mely has been a member of PMPC for almost three years. In the future, Mely hopes to expand her snack-vending activity to other nearby towns.

loans.use: To purchase bananas, sticks, and ingredients for making snacks and juice

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 46 years old and lives in Guintomoyan, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has 5 school-aged children. For the past 12 years, Edna has earned an income from agribusiness, particularly in coconut production and hog fattening activities. She is also an elected barangay (village) official. 

Edna earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month from her business activities, an amount very beneficial to meet her family's needs. She has requested a loan to purchase 4 piglets and 4 sacks of booster feed for her business. Edna has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, Edna hopes to expand her hog fattening business by establishing an additional pig pen at her house.

loans.use: To purchase 4 piglets and 4 sacks of booster feed

loans.name: Juditha

texts.en:
Juditha is 53 years old and widowed.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Juditha has borrowed and paid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years, and also earns an income from pig fattening.

Juditha aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
As a married mother of seven children, Gloria works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell vegetable business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening.  Gloria is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell to customers.

Gloria has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to provide a secure future for family.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables

loans.name: Zosanitas

texts.en:
Zosanitas works hard to support her family. She is married, and has a buy and sell firewood business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 12 years now.

Zosanitas requested a PHP 28,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of firewood to sell to her customers.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of firewood

loans.name: Eden

texts.en:
Eden is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  She is 35 years old, and both of her children are in school.

Eden has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 26,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more seafood to sell.

Eden has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more seafood

loans.name: Jacquiline

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Jacquiline works hard to support her family.

She has a vegetable farming business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling flowers. Jacquiline is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Jacquiline has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilzers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Liza works hard to support her family.

She has a clothing sales business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Liza is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more stock of clothing to resell.

Liza has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock of clothing to resell.

loans.name: Mamah

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of Ruma's agents, Mamah. Mamah lives in a suburb located about a five hour drive from Jakarta. Mamah is happily married. Together with her husband, they have three beautiful daughters. 

Mamah owns a stall that sells daily consumer products and provides mobile payment services for her community.  She decided to join Ruma because she wants to try another business opportunity using technology. As a woman, Mamah realized that it’s important for her to help her husband increase their family’s income.

As the business grows, Mamah is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits and bill payment services to her community. 

Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Mamah improve her business and accordingly, her community, that needs access to such services. 

Mamah’s goal with Ruma in the nearly future is to serve as an e-commerce business for her community, the latest Ruma product called 'Mapan'. As seen in the photo, Mamah is the one who is sitting in her own stall. She thanks you for your kind support.

loans.use: to buy mobile airtime credits and bill payment services.

loans.name: Rismawati

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! We’d like you to meet one of Ruma's agents, Rismawati. Rismawati is a young lady who lives in Garut, a city located about a four hour drive from Jakarta. 

Rismawati sells mobile airtime credits and provides mobile payment services for her community. She decided to join Ruma because she wants to learn about expanding a business using technology, as well as to increase her revenue and savings so that she can try another business opportunity later.  Rismawati is a friendly and hardworking person. Her community sees her as a trusted mobile airtime credit and bill payment services provider. 

As the business grows, Rismawati needs additional capital  loan from Kiva lenders. She will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits and bill payment services to her community. 

Rismawati’s goal  in the nearly future is to serve as an e-commerce business for her community, the latest product from Ruma called 'Mapan'. 

As seen in the photo, Rismawati is the one who is sitting. She is thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to selling mobile airtime credits and provide bill payment services.

loans.name: Jeremiah

texts.en:
Jeremiah is a bright, visionary and verbal farmer from Nyamira, a small agricultural town in Kenya known for maize. He is the third born in a family of six siblings, and has been through secondary schooling but due to circumstances out of his control, he dropped out. He describes his upbringing as challenging. 

Jeremiah is hardworking and always says, “I eat from my sweat.” His primary source of income has been milk, eggs and crops. Most of the small holder farmers in his village own approximately half an acre per household and this has made them work extra hard to fully utilize their farms. 

Jeremiah has been practicing mixed farming and he enjoys the income he gets, but he has been facing challenges delivering his products to the market. Nyamira town is a very remote area and the roads are in pathetic condition; this has hampered Jeremiah from making timely delivery of products to the market while still fresh. Jeremiah sells vegetables, milk and tomatoes which are very perishable and require quick delivery if you are to fetch a high price. 

Jeremiah is seeking a loan to buy a motorbike that will help him deliver his products to the market in a timely way so he can overcome the challenge of facing losses. Through the loan he will deliver the products in a timely manner to the market, and this means he will never suffer losses, which will translate into an immediate increase in profits. 

Jeremiah plans to employ someone who will help him on the farm and deliver products to his large client base. Profits from the loan will be used to comfortably repay the loan fully and invest in a solid foundation for his family to come.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike to deliver his products to the market.

loans.name: Carlos Andres

texts.es: Andres está casado con su esposa que se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, Andres tiene 2 hijas, la mayor  de 7 años y la menor de 4 años, mismas que están estudiando, Andres  vive en una casa humilde con su familia, Andres  se dedica a trabajar de albañil y a la crianza de animales, con el dinero del crédito Andres  va a comprar chanchos para que su esposa le ayude en el cuidado  de estos animales. La aspiración de este padre responsable es de seguir  trabajando duro por sus hijas y mejorarles la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Andres is married, and his wife raises small animals.  Andres has two daughters.  The oldest is seven years old, and the youngest is four years old.  They go to school.  Andres lives in a humble house with his family.  Andres works as a bricklayer, and he raises animals.

With the money from the loan Andres will buy pigs for his wife to help with the care of these animals.  The aspiration of this responsible father is to continue working hard for his daughters and to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Arlyn

texts.en:
Arlyn, 47 years old, is married and has seven children. She lives in Dumingag. Arlyn and her husband earn a living through farming. They mastered this type of activity when they got married and have supported their children's education and their family's needs. 

Arlyn joined Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative in February 2009. She is a hardworking mother who has a strong determination to pursue her goals for the benefit of her family. Arlyn has requested a loan to purchase fertilizer and bags of chicken manure, and to pay for land preparation to have a good and high crop yield on her rice and watermelon farm. This will help her gain more income on her farm. Someday, Arlyn hopes to buy land to expand her farming activities and venture into agri-business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and chicken manure, and to pay for land preparation to have a good and high crop yield on her farm

loans.name: Ma. Nessa

texts.en:
Ma. Nessa, 46, lives in Mahayag, Zamboanga del Norte and is married. She and her husband are both farmers, having raised their family doing this type of activity. This industrious member finds herself plowing the rice field and planting vegetables and other varieties of agricultural commodities to continue putting bread on the table. 

Ma. Nessa decided to join Paglaum Cooperative as she was in need of additional working capital. She has received several loans already and recently requested PHP 25,000 to pay for labor costs and land preparation on her rice farm and to buy fertilizer and herbicides to increase crop yield. Being an MIGS member (Member in Good Standing) of the cooperative, Ma. Nessa has been able to manage her income and to provide for her family's daily needs. Ma. Nessa is very thankful because, if it were not for Paglaum, she might not have any savings at all nor be guided properly in her finances. She hopes to own a land tractor someday for fast and easy farm work.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs and land preparation on her rice farm and to buy fertilizer and herbicides to increase crop yield

loans.name: Khorm

texts.en:
A resident from a rural village of the Chi Kreng district, Khorm is a 52-year-old mother of six children, three of whom are dependents. The main sources of the family’s income are from rice farming and selling fish, which she has been in for years. With her current business, she can earn about KHR 32,000 per day to spend for daily expenses. 

This is the fourth loan for Khorm with VisionFund. She successfully paid back the loans with VisionFund. Now she is seeking another loan to buy household supplies for using in her family. She hopes to have enough home appliances, and in the future, she wants to buy a decent motorbike for use by her family.

loans.use: to buy household supplies for using in her family

location.town: Siem Reap province, Chi Kreng district

loans.name: Channy

texts.en:
Channy, aged 46, is married. She and her husband have six children and live in a thatched roof house in a rural village in the Chi Kreng district of Siem Reap province.  Channy and her husband have earned a living for many years through farming rice, raising pigs and fishing. Channy is able to earn approximately 30,000 KHR per day to support her family. 

This is Channy's fourth loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She is requesting a loan of 1,600,000 KHR to buy pig feed for nourishing her pigs. She hopes to fatten her pigs so as to sell them for a good price.

loans.use: to buy pig feed to nourish her pigs

location.town: Siem Reap province, Chi Kreng district

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en: Hussein is a 22-year-old Lebanese single man who lives with his parents. Due to the family's poor financial situation, Hussein works non-stop, on his own, to be able to help his father. He has been working as a plumber since 2007. Hussein is an honest man and very punctual, which makes his customers loyal to him. Hussein is asking for a loan from Kiva's partner, Vitas s.a.l , to renew his plumbing tools. This loan will facilitate his business operations and allow him to increase his revenue. This is how Hussein works to help his parents live a very comfortable life away from struggle.

loans.use: to renew his plumbing tools

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy oranges, bananas, and tangerines.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna, 47 years old, is married and has six children, four of whom are studying and need school fees. She and her spouse manage a farming business, planting and harvesting rice to sell. Edna also buys and sells vegetables and fish to the people in her village for added income. Edna aspires for better income in their businesses to sustain her family's needs. 

Edna is now asking for additional capital of PHP 10,000 to invest in the farming business. She will buy fertilizers and insecticides that help maintain good crop production. Additional revenue will be saved as revolving capital and for education expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides for her farming business.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.en: Beatriz finds pleasure in doing her farming activities. She is not only doing her hobby; she earns an income as well. Beatriz busies herself to sufficiently provide for the family. She grabbed the opportunity to become a full-fledged member of PMPC. She credits the cooperative with providing her with capital to support her farming activities. Beatriz recently applied for a loan to buy farm inputs and to pay for land and seedbed preparation. In the future, Beatriz wishes to arrange a decent house for her family.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs and to pay for land and seedbed preparation

loans.name: Babylyn

texts.en: Babylyn has considerably prepared for the post-harvest operations of her palay (rice crop) in Mahayag. She wants to ensure that she will have ample time for the  threshing, drying, storage and processing of her harvest to make way for another cropping season. She presented her proposal to Paglaum MPC and received a loan. Babylyn hopes to see all her children finish their degrees and have stable careers.

loans.use: to pay for post-harvest operations

loans.name: Angelie

texts.en:
Angelie joined Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative to avail herself of financial assistance. She tried her luck on doing a business focusing on her rice farming activities. She feels she owes her fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used as capital. 

She is seeking an amount to pay for post-harvest operation of her palay (rice field) and make way for another cropping season. Angelie looks for better business ventures and earns a good income for the good of her family.

loans.use: to pay for post-harvest operation of her palay (rice field) and make way for another cropping season

loans.name: Charlotte

texts.en:
Charlotte has always had the enthusiasm for farming. She has cultivated their rice land in Mahayag and has yielded good earnings doing this type of work. 

Recently, she applied for a loan to pay for the threshing, drying, storage and processing of her harvest. She wants to ensure that she will have ample time and resources for this cropping season. Charlotte knows that she has to get things right and make way for the next cropping. 

In the future, Charlotte hopes to buy a hauling truck for the easy transport of produce.

loans.use: to pay for the threshing, drying, storage and processing of her harvest
